column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We have just returned from a 2 week stay at the Tuscana Lodge and had a lovely time. We booked a 3 bedroom apartment and it was very spacious and had everything we needed. The only negative thing i would say is that we where in block 3 and the it was very noisey from the highway which is right by the Tuscana Lodge. We did use the pool which was lovely and we ate a few times in the hotel and the food was lovely and very reasonable. I would recommend this hotel but if you are in block 3/4/5 i would ask to be moved. Also i should mention it is in an excellent location to all attractions and there is Publix supermarket and petrol station just around the corner which came in very handy also a Chilli's restaurant which we could not get a table in as so busy but we did get a takeaway which was terrible..

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estuvimos en abril 8 dias en familia, excelente la atencion en la recepcion, los departametnos contaban con todo lo que uno necesita, cocina, lavarropas, secarropas, lavavajillas, dos baños, 3 dormitorios, todo en perfecto estado. Los espacios comunes en excelente estado y atencion del personal muy buena. Solo nos quedamos con las ganas de tener internet, pero es solo un pequeño detalle.Si vuelvo, me alojaria nuevamete ahi.. excelente.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: They say you should start off with good comments. Well the resort is beautiful, on the outside. The rooms are another story. The carpets are very dirty. There are more than enough bugs to annoy you. My lock was broken, the wait time for maintainence is ridiculous. I actually, had to stop someone I found while walking around on their grounds to repair the lock. Don't expect anything in the room to be replinished, towels. washclothes, trashbags, tissues, etc. You will be told to purchase your own, or reuse the materials they've provided. Confirm your movie theater reservations because they will book you for a completely different time, and make no attempt to accommodate you. Finally, they will end your stay with that lovely question, "how was your stay". Needless to say, my response was far from "great". You've been warned!!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Went for 2 weeks in August 2014 with Thomson on the Dreamliner (nice plane). The apartments are no more than 1 hours drive from Sanford and very easy to find off the I4. The complex is well set out and the facilities are good (pool & gym). The apartments are huge, clean and well stocked. Both bedrooms have large walk-in wardrobes. We were on the top floor so no noisy people above. Couldn't hear the freeway. 20 - 45 minutes to Universal, depending on traffic. Reception staff were always helpful. Other review say the apartments are tatty. They don't have flat screen tv's, but we didn't go to Florida to watch telly! Supermarket, chemist & restaurants close by. I would definitely recommend Tuscana Resort to anyone with families going to Florida.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: This resort is very nice. My family and I had a wonderful place to stay . The room is like a small apartment. 3 bed rooms and a pull out sofa bed and we were all comfortable. A few minors issues one the hotel charges for everything, the free wifi is only free in the main lobby and by the pool there is an extra charge for wifi in the rooms. Two we never saw housekeeping we needed extra trash bags there wasn't any, I was wondering of housekeeping ever existed. We used bags from the supermarket to put trash in and no towels I bought soap and must washed the towels we had over and over again. You have to pay to rent a movie I paid 30 for the week and I did not once rent a movie . There isn't any shopping areas everything is over 10 to 20 minutes away from the hotel . Make sure your car is gased up and ready. Over all nice place to stay and hide out no one to bother you or check on you.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: What to say about this lovely Tuscana resort
column29: What to say about this lovely Italian style resort. We were a group of 7 French visiting all the attractions park around Orlando and we absolutely loved it. The apartment is fully furnished, there is a nice restaurant inside and you have just around the corner a petrol station open 24 hours and a big supermarket if you want to cook. Not far away by car to the attractions parks such as Universal studio. Inside Tuscana resort you have a view on a golf park and a beautiful swimming pool and a hot tub. You have to drink at the bar where prices are more and more than okay during the happy hour. Of course Jenny the bartender is just great she makes you feel comfortable and in holidays. We loved her!! We are definitely coming back to this resort!!!!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Booked this resort with no research or idea at all, and it was absolutely out of this world. The room/apartment had everything you could possibly need and more, the bar and pool area was superb, with all the staff being helpful and very friendly. Really cannot rate this higher, nicely out of the way if all the madness of international drive only 15 min drive from all the parks. Don't think about it, book it!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Notice that I left my watch in the drawer that day after checking out. Called front desk and housekeeping to look and check. After 3 days, I was given 4 different stories as to why they either did not check or check and nothing found. I asked the manager to call me, as of now no manager called me. I will never come back here because the staff and housekeeping are thiefs and liars.
column59: New York, New York, United States

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: I was robbed at this resort by one of their employees! He went into our room and took money from my purse and then went on the run! The resort did nothing for me and my family, we felt violated, he went through all our clothes and personal belongings. I can't believe they where given an award from Trip Advisor! I still have yet to receive an apology from the resort manager who was on vacation at the time of my stay.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Photos in brochure are misleading, there are NO apartments overlooking the swimming pool. You are led to believe there are multiple pools, there are not. Just a paddling pool and the main pool. It is stated that there is a dedicated Olympic sized swimming pool, rubbish, the swimming area varies from 3' 6" to 4' 6" and is only 25 m long and is joined to the play area so any serious swimming is impossible.Our apartment was tidy and functional with a view over Championsgate golf course. Staff was very slow clearing up around the pool after the night before, often not clearing rubbish until mid afternoon, very disappointing when you are spending any time at the pool during the day.Restaurant gave a good meal but the takeaway meal was undercooked and had to be thrown away, $89 wasted.Overall a nice site, ideally placed from parks.Our overriding gripe was the noise from other apartments above, horrendous. When a family with small children arrived it was like thunder. The children were running back and fore constantly, even up to 3am, then the mother decides to put the washer drier on, OH JOY!!!Lastly if you intend going, make sure you have the correct address from internet as Thomsons give out the wrong one making you run round and round for hours.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Nos hospedamos en este Resort 3 familias en 3 aptos. diferentes.Amplios, cómodos, con todos los enseres necesarios para poder desayunar y comer. La ropa blanca muy bien, hay que contratar aparte el servicio de mucamas.Tiene piscina amplia y limpia, con servicio de bar en el mismo predio. Nosotros prácticamente no la usamos porque el agua estaba muy caliente y estamos acostumbrados a aguas más fresca por estas latitudes.Supermercado y centro comercial muy cerca.Para ir a Disney hay que disponer de vehículo, de lo contrario queda un poco alejado.Lo recomendamos 100 x x100

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We checked in smoothly for 4 days and 3 nights. The lady at the front desk was nice and welcoming. We entered out unit. We weren't expecting it to be so big. We had a 3 bedroom - 2 bath unit including a living room, dining room, balcony, and full kitchen. We didn't have a chance to take a swim or workout at the gym because we were in theme parks the whole time. But, we took a look, it looked awesome. This place is great for families on vacation. Enough space for everyone. The price was great for how much you get. We were also surprised to see a DVD machine in the front desk (almost like a Redbox). There is also a PlayStation 3 in the living room. The use of wifi and the PlayStation 3 has a fee of about $7.99 a night, but with the price of one night at this resort being less than $110.00 for a three bedroom unit, it's a great deal. There was also a washer and dryer in the unit, great for washing wet clothes from the water park or the beach. The A/C was perfect. There is a restaurant on the property and it's a gated resort. Close to restaurants (2-5 mins away) and area attractions (15-20 mins away). Loved our stay here. I would come back and I highly recommend staying here when visiting Orlando, Florida.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Awesome place close to Disney but far enough away from loud crowded touristy spots.
column29: My family of four (2 adults & a 10 & 14 yr old) had a fantastic 2-week stay at this resort in June 2013. It was recommended by a condo owner friend & we were definitely NOT disappointed! It was 15 min. drive to Disney, away from the hustle & bustle. Has a lovely pub to eat or drink by the pool, casual restaurant to eat at after late days at the park, cabanas if you prefer, LOTS of pool loungers, AHHHMAZING pool, incl. a fenced toddler splash area, pool towels available (just ask), secure gated entrance, Chili's Restaurant & a super convenient gas station at the driveway corner as well! Pizza pub & grocery store is right next door. Staff were amazingly helpful & friendly! Condo apts were tastefully decorated, clean, COMFY beds, breakfast bars in kitchen as well as sep. dining very spacious with covered, screened patios. All kitchen supplies, coffee maker, toaster, utensils, pots, pans, etc.The only thing I can suggest to improve is wifi in the condo (I wouldn't mind paying even a small fee) so that we can research our daily plans, maps, etc. It was available in the pool & pub area but not in condo.Would definitely recommend!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Stayed a week with my family. I appreciated the resort feel compared to the usual gated communities that are found in Kissimmee region. Right off I-4, minutes away from everything. Nilda at front desk was very helpful and quick to answer your questions. Check-in was smooth and quick. I arrived early and my room was available for early check-in as I requested.Pool area is great with plenty of chairs and shades area. The only critique is that the bar/resto does not allow you to bring any food and I found the manager a little arrogant when informing guests of no food policy at pool. Management should address this. The rooms are spacious and clean. However they really need to replace the old tv's. If I can find a plasma tv in my room in Varadero, Cuba...I believe they can do better.Would recommend to families.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Great place to stay - lovely resort in peaceful location
column29: Excellent apartments with all the facilities you need. Reception staff couldn't have been more helpful. Pool is fantastic, a nice size and sun beds always available. The cabanas are a great touch and there was always one free whatever time we went to the pool. A car is definitely needed as resort is a little way from Disney (10/15 mins drive along the I4) but we enjoyed being able to escape the chaos of the parks. The cinema room is great, lots of DVD's to borrow or rent and kids loved it! If you like wildlife, racoons are in abundance (& let you get really close to them), various types of birds and we even saw an armadillo! Husband used the gym on several occasions during our stay and was very impressed - does get busy at the weekends though. All in all, I would thoroughly recommend this resort.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Good sized apartments and nice pool. Pool side cabanas provide shade for those not used to the Florida sun. DVD rental proved useful for entertaining kids on wet nights. Only real downside was lack of chairs in apartment, we had booked for 5 people but only 4 chairs available and reception unable to provide any more.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: El resort cuenta con todas las comodidades que necesita una familia para unas vacaciones geniales. Ademas de la cercanía con todos los parques. Estuvimos en un dpto con 2 habitaciones todo alfombrado, muy cómodo y todo nuevo y muy bien cuidado. Llegamos tarde a la noche y no tuvimos ningún inconveniente, hablando por teléfono previamente te esperan o dejan la llave del dpto con los guardias.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estube una semana alojandome con mi familia en este lugar, realmente estuvimos muy a gusto en esa estadia. Los deptos son muy amplios, muy buen equipamiento y buena limpieza.El personal es amable y te ayudan hasta con consultas mas alla de lo relacionado al hotel.Los espacios comunes estan excelentes, infelizmente los parques no me dejaron tiempo para disfrutar mas de ellos. El lugar es tranquilo, alejado de la ciudad con vista al golf. Lo unico que mejoraria es instalar Wifi en las habitaciones, si bien hay internet es por cable.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Buena opción para aquellos que van a visitar disney world y quieren apartarse un poco de los parques. Se encuentra a 15 minutos por autopista de los mismos. Son departamentos muy cómodos y muy bien equipados. Además cuenta con estacionamiento sin cargo y hay tiendas cercanas para comprar comida.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Increible experiencia en Orlando. Cerca de los parques a solo seis kilometros. Se ecuebtra ubicado en Champion Gate sobre la ruta 4. Amplios condominios con habitaciones en suites y todos los servicion. Muy buena relacion precio calidad.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Lovely condo with clean pool area, would stay there again. You need a car as everything is too far out to drive, but this is the American way. The only issue we had the whole time we were there is that the gym equipment needed repair and remained broken for our entire stay, but on the plus side Golds gym was not too far away.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Las habitaciones son extremadamente comodas y en muy buen estado. La cocina muy bien equipada, los banos amplios y comodos. El comedor y el living hacian que la estadia de una familia fuera confortable, sin que nos estuviesemos "molestando" todo el tiempo.La atencion del Front Desk tambien fue muy buena. Y la pileta muy linda.Es una excelente relacion precio-calidad. Las habitaciones no incluyen servicio de limpieza, pero ese es un pequeno precio a pagar por tener semejeantes instalaciones por un precio tan economico.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estuvimos por tercera vez en el Tuscana, y como siempre todo increíble. Nos dieron un upgrade de habitación gratuito ya que estábamos en temporada baja y eramos viajeros frecuentes. Las habitaciones son amplias y muy cómodas, está completamente equipado, cocina como de una casa (lavarropas y secarropas). Baños grandes y limpios. Capaz le falta un poco de luz pero nada raro.En cuanto a la ubicación es de fácil acceso ya que esta a metros de la autopista. Y el servicio, si bien no te arreglan el apartamento, en la recepción siempre están dispuestos a ayudarte con lo que necesites.A tener en cuenta: no hay wifi en las habitaciones, hay un cable para conectar a la pc. Si hay en el lobby.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Great Resort will return next year! !!!
column29: The staff was very nice and very accommodating. The place is very clean. Can't wait until next year. Our family had so much fun at the pool and the theater. Definitely will refer family and friends to stay there on their trip to Orlando

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Nuestro departamento con dos dormitorios fue super comodo. 3 adultos y dos chicos pueden estar perfectamente, sin "molestarse" incluso en una estadia larga como fue la nuestra de mas de dos semanas.El departamenteo cuenta con heladera, lavarropas, secarropas, horno microondas, horno electrico (enorme). Preparar la comida en el departamento antes de ir a Disney es una buena forma de ahorrar dinero.La pileta del hotel tambien era muy amplia y agradable.El trato del staff del hotel tambien fue muy cordial.Lo unico, no habia cortinas o blackout en la habitacion, por lo que uno termina despertandose cual canario con la luz del dia.Volveria sin dudarlo.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Elegimos este resort por su posibilidad de hacerlo a través de Despegar y pagar en pesos y cuotas y nos resulto fantástico. Las habitaciones son grandes con cama matrimonial, vestidor y baño en suite. Nuestro departamento tenia 2 habitaciones y un living con sofá cama matrimonial. Las habitaciones y el living con TV y cable de muchos canales. Cocina totalmente equipada, heladera, horno común y microondas, utensilios. Cambien tiene un balcón terraza, son 3 pisos por edificio y creo que tiene 5 edificios. también creo que hay un campo de golf. Lo único es que dan un kit de papel higiénico y detergente por estadía, el resto lo compra uno. Nosotros tuvimos un inconveniente con el aire y nos cambiaron de apartamento enseguida. Fueron muy amables en todo. El servicio de limpieza tiene costo extra, nosotros no lo necesitamos. Esta situado en un lugar muy cerca de la I4, con acceso a todos los parques en 15 o 20 minutos. Cerca hay estación de servicio, super y algunos lugares para comer.Como espacios comunes tiene pileta, solarium, gimnasio, jacuzzi, restaurant, recepción con pc.Wi fi solo en el área de la piscina y recepción.Entrada con código de seguridad. La verdad no tuvimos ningún problema. Todo muy muy bien.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Excelente lugar para hospedarse / No tan buena la atencion
column29: Ediliciamente mas que suficiente para hospedarse. Habitaciones espaciosas y comodas. Al menos nuestro departamento tenia lava y seca ropas. Cocina completa. Limpieza muy buena. Lo que no es tan buena es la atencion ya que en la pagina del hotel dicen que venden tickets para los parques de disney y otras atracciones pero ya no tienen mas ese servicio. Y por ej al solicitar una bolsita de detergente para el lavavajillas, este fue negado. Pileta hermosa y con sector para chicos muy lindo. Buena ubicacion por estar cerca de los parques de Disney.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Excelente atención. Ideal para ir con chicos. Distancia ideal para llegar a todos los parques.Supermercados y restaurants muy cerca.Zona muy tranquila y residencial.Los departamentos en excelente estado y super amplios

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Hi, if anybody that works there is reading this, please read. Tuscana was a really fun experience. However, I left something. I was in room 8204. If anybody could find a stuffed animal that had a heart that said 'Love You!' On it. It's a childhood memory and I can't sleep without it. If you could mail it to us, that would be great.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Having driven from Washington DC to Orlando over a 6 day period, Tuscana Resort was to be our Final Destination for the remaining 9 nights of our holiday. We arrived very late at night, but our keys were in a lock box (that I couldn't find initially) and with one phone call a concierge came and helped me out. The apartment itself was excellent. Spotless clean, and very spacious. It was actually a 3 bed of which we only used one. It had a lovely balcony overlooking the golf course where we sat each morning for breakfast. The pool and the facilities were excellent. We only had one lunch there and it was delicious. If I had to make any negative comment, I felt the staff were very brusque. I found this very unusual. Having said that I would recommend and indeed did recommend to my Australian who visited this May and loved it as much as I did.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Como estávamos indo para Orlando, onde praticamente só iríamos ao hotel para tomar banho e dormir, optamos por um hotel com melhor custo benefício e acertamos na escolha! Primeiro a localização, excelente, perto dos parques e dos outlets. Adorei o hotel, os funcionários super atenciosos! Cozinha bem equipada, com fogão, lava louças, tudo exatamente como nas fotos do site, também com secadora e máquina de lavar, cama confortável, bom chuveiro, a área da piscina tb ótima (apesar de ter utilizado apenas no dia que cheguei, rs). O hotel recebe encomendas e foi tudo entregue com o maior controle possível, caso queira faxineira só solicitar, mas é cobrado por fora, creio que 50 dolares o dia! Não tem wifi nos quartos, mas vc pode solicitar e pagar a diária do modem, não recordo o preco, mas nada exorbitante. Só uma ressalva, evite deixar roupas no chão ou jogadas, apesar de estar tudo pintadinho, em alguns dias vi algumas traças andando nas paredes próximo ao chão (creio que por ter carpete)!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Wow what a fab place to stay! Dream holiday from the moment we checked in as we got upgraded! We had a minor problem with freezer but within ten mins of calling reception maintenance had come and fixed it. Well equipped spacious spotless apartment a true home from home.Pool side tavern food was of excellent quality only downside is you are not allowed to take any of your own food and drink (even soft drinks) to pool area and bar is quite pricey.But had a an amazing holiday can't wait to book again!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Sinta-se em casa na sua próxima viagem a Orlando. Muito boa estrutura com TV a cabo em todos os quartos, ar condicionado central, cozinha completa e prática. O condomínio inclui piscina aquecida e jacuzzi, bar e restaurante. Fica devendo wifi nos apartamentos, mas ponto de rede para notebook. Recomendo!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: The room quality is determined by the room owner. Ours was poor. When I complained to the front desk they told me they had no control over the quality, they only provided the rental availability for the owner. Bottom line, nice exterior facilities but poor room accommodations and a unconcerned management give this place a low grade. I won't be back no matter how cheap. Once you've stayed at some of the better Orlando facilities you get spoiled. I wrote a nice long letter in detail explaining all the problems and never heard a word from the management. This seems to be the only way to warn people of any potential problems. I talked to several who loved the place and others who were not so inclined. Evidently a cheap rental converts to not having enough money to keep your room updated and furnished.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Returned from a 2 week holiday staying here in June. 3 adults and 3 children stayed in a 3 bed condo. Plenty of space, very clean. Balcony was very safe for the children with a mesh surrounding it. As others have mentioned there is slight noise from the rooms above walking around but not that it bothered us. The only downside is the lack of WiFi. POOL is lovely and really warm, lots of sunbeds. We ate in the restaurant once and it was a really nice meal and reasonably priced too.You defiantly need a car to stay here but it is ideally located for all the parks with Disney a 15 minutes drive away and 25 minutes to International Drive area.We would recommend this resort and wouldn't hesitate staying here again.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: O Tuscana Resort é uma ótima escolha.Eles está bem localizado e é próximo das principais atrações da região - parques e shoppings.Os serviços de piscina e manutenção são muito bons.Os apartamentos são confortáveis e equipados com o básico para uma boa estadia.Volto e recomendo.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Nice but too far away from the Parks
column29: Grounds are beautifully maintained. There's a big pool area and lots of chairs. Plenty of space for parking. We had a 3 bedroom 2 bath with full kitchen. Living area was a bit small but with the dining room, we had plenty of space. Also had a small patio that came in handy. Many places nearby (within a mile) - Pizzeria, McDonalds, Subway, gas stations, Publix, Walgreens, liquor, nail salon and more. Problem was that it was quite a distance from all the parks and things to do in Orlando. The mileage didn't seem bad, but with traffic, it took at least 30 minutes to get anywhere. I would have enjoyed staying here more if we didn't have the parks on our schedule. It would be a nice place to just chill out, enjoy the pool, etc. No wifi was a little bit of an issue - but we got over it.The units were clean, roomy and reasonable. A couple of small issues (broken towel rack) but no big deal. You need to take out your own garbage (no problem - dumpsters very handy) and supply much of your own items such as dish soap, sponge, etc. Again, no big deal because we've stayed at places like this before and were prepared. Plus having the Publix right down the street helps. I was in between rating this resort average and very good, mainly because of the distance from what we had planned to do. Overall it's a beautiful resort and great place to stay.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Nice Accommodations for families near Disney
column29: Stayed in 3 bedrooms/ 2 bath, full kitchen, near the pool. Spacious, clean, comfortable, and great value. It is about 4 miles from Disney. Great if you want to get away but a little too far given there are other similar accommodations closer. No wifi available in the rooms only wired connections. Bring your own modem. TVs are outdated with no HDMi connector. The rooms while comfortable are not well stocked. You must provide your own dish detergent, paper towels, garbage bags, etc. Other condos in the area provide these amenities. You have to take out your own trash and the bins are not conveniently placed. Our kitchen light was out during our entire stay and no one repaired it although we called the front desk several times.Pool is very nice and the place is very family friendly.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Muy buena opción para ir a Disney
column29: Es una muy buena opción para ir a los parques, esta a 20 minutos, está muy cerca de los Mall, camino al Resort hay estación de servicio, Mac Donals, Supermercado Publix.Son departamentos cómodos, con habitaciones amplias, baños individuales para cada habitación , Heladera, cocina con horno, lavarropas, secarropas, todo como para sentirse en casa a una muy buena relación Precio-Calidad

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: I have just returned back from tuscana which was my 4th year I have been. Once again a great stay. The team at the front desk very polite and are still doing a great job.This is starting to feel a home from home and I will be coming back next year.Once again unit in first class condition and very clean and tidy.Pool again ideal and at the perfect temp for a swim.The bar is wonderful and dave and his staff and also doing A fantastic job.I wouldn't stay anywhere else so keep up the good work guys and thanks again for a wonderful vacation

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: I was a little afraid after reading some of the negative reviews, but my family and I had a wonderful experience. Some of the reviews did prepare me to bring paper towels , tissue, soap, etc. . We had a three bedroom and it was clean and spacious. I loved the heated pool. My husband really liked the screened in balcony. The only complaint I had was that the upstairs guest was running constantly , but once we called the front desk, they called them and let them know. Later my husband met the family and found out that their son was autistic( I felt bad, but the noise was continuous). Customer service was great. We even added an extra night . We stayed 6 nights total . I give this condo 5 stars. The TVs were old but they showed good and we were so busy at the parks TV was not on my mind. There is a grocery store, mcdonalds, chillis , and subwAy nearby. I can go on and on.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: El complejo es excelente, tranquilo, amplio, con piscina muy buena, etc. Queda a 20 minutos de los malls y de los parques, también hay supermercados a menos de 5 minutos. Excelente opción para hospedarse y disfrutar un poco fuera de los parques.Los departamentos son espectaculares, muy amplios, con todas las comodidades que uno puede pedir. Cuenta con cocina completa con horno, microondas, cafetera, tostadora, heladera gigante, lavavajillas, lavarropas y secarropas. Las habitaciones poseen cada una un baño en suite y vestidor. El living cuenta con cómodos sillones y hasta posee un balcón. Volvería a elegirlo, sin lugar a dudas.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: en gral excelente todo, muy buena pileta, la atencion excelente, habitaciones amplias, cocina completa con cocina electrica, lavaplatos, lavarropas secarropas, esta cerca de los malls y parques( 15 min max) el unico defecto a mi gusto es q las habitaciones no tienen cortinas pesadas o blackouts lo q hace q desde muy temprano haya mucha luz. despues todo excelente, volveria sin dudar

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Great place just far enough away from Disney and Universal
column29: Party of Canadian and English men who spent two weeks here in March 2014. 1. Location - very near main roads in / out of Orlando. 25 minutes to Universal but less to Disney. Also good access for Tampa and west coast (highly recommended). 2. Rooms - absolutely huge for us limeys who are used to being crammed in. Clean and tastefully decorated with great fridge and washing machine. Lovely dining room with great outdoor dining too. Beds were fab with walk in dressing rooms and lovely shower etc. TV viewing area far too small however. 3. Resort area and pool - international clientele relax around clean, friendly and casual pool and jacuzzi zone. Fabulous cafe area with superb staff. 4. Local area - Champion's Gate very small with selection good shops and supermarket. Chillis easily the best eateries. A must visit on your trip. 5. Overall experience - relaxed, clean and up-market resort but quite a way from Central Orlando. We would return.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We spent the Easter Week at the Resort. We had a free upgrade to a 3 Bedroom across from the pool. This Condo was clean and well maintained. The oven door was worn and did not close properly, but it worked fine for oven pizzas. The pool was excellent and the location was a great starting point for our 5 day vacation. Staff was helpful & pleasent. We will recommend this resort to friends & family. I hope to book another stay next year.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We have just returned from a 2 week family holiday that included a 5 night stay at Tuscana. Perfect location, we got a 3 bed condo after booking a 2 bed which was a great bonus. We were in block 4 which a was short 5 minute walk to the great communal pool area, it was clean and had a good size pool and jacuzzi. The bar area was also excellent with very reasonable prices, all food orders were quick and the lady behind the bar was always polite and very helpful. Even when busy it was not over crowded. I read some poor reviews before i came and was slightly concerned but i really can not see how anyone could not enjoy there stay here. Many mentioned the lady at the check in desk but she was very polite, helpful and even apologised for being on the phone when we walked in, we came across 3 other members of staff in the reception who were all helpful and friendly. The condo itself had everything you could want fridge freezer, cooker, all pots and pans, plates etc, washer and dryer, en-suite in one room plus another good size bathroom, tv's in all rooms plus it was very well kept. I really can not speak highly enough of this place and will certainly be back, it is close to all you want inc disney but just far enough away from all the crowds. I work in the travel business and we have just obtained various accounts with airlines to allow us to put together holidays to such places as Florida and Tuscana will be top of our list to recommend to our potential customers. We even ended up here for an extra night at the end of our holiday due to having to be in orlando very early the next morning and again found everyone helpful and had a different condo in block 7 which was equally as good.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Perto dos parques, e de centros comercias, o apartamento era muito grande e completo...para quem vai aos parques e compras perfeito... nos não usamos a piscina, mas ficamos num apartamento no final, então para quem vai e pretende usar a piscina fica longe (dependendo do bloco que você ficou).. resumindo muito recomendável.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Queria contar mi experiencia me hosped es este resort; quiero agradecer al sr andre por la atencion que me ayudo con un tema personal; las habitacion muy comoda la cama igual; la cocina completa; sin ruidos muy cerca de malls y parque de disney; lo unico a mejorar que en las habitacion no hay cortinados ni blockouts, lo raro que el living si; el lugar donds no se descansa.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Me hospede com a minha família, esposo e 2 filhos, no Tuscana Resort em abril deste ano, os funcionários são muito atenciosos e prestativos, o apartamento era ótimo, enorme e super confortável, sem aquele cheiro de umidade típico..Em quanto á ubicação é perto dos parques, outlets, supermercados ( tem um Publix a 1km).. Com certeza da próxima vez voltaremos lá..

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: We stayed here for our family reunion, it was GREAT!
column29: We rented two 3 bedroom condos for our family reunion. Everything was very clean. The kitchen was well equipped, allowing us to make our own food. The dining table was spacious and the family sat comfortably. We even used the grill and had a wonderful BBQ with our family. They had picnic benches where we spread out all of our food. We were only 4 exits away from Disney. The only reason it didn't get an excellent is that the beds could be a little more comfortable.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: nos alojamos en tuscana resort los primeros dias de mayo 2014, en un depto de 3 dormitorios muy amplio y comodo, totalmente equipado. les cuento unos detalles que son muy importantes,antes de llegar por la pagina despegar efectue unos pedidos al resort y todos fueron cumplidos, planta baja, cerca de la piscina climatizada abierta hasta 10 pm y una cuna para bebe. El tema de que no hay wifi en habitaciones se soluciona muy facil, se llevan el router de su casa y lo conectan en el depto tal como lo hice yo y funciono perfecto, no se arriesguen a alquilar router alli se agotan rapido o compren uno alla pero hay que configurarlo .El complejo esta ubicado en un entorno muy tranquilo rodeado de mucha vegetacion en una zona nueva llamada champions gate,la unica contra que tiene es que esta un poco alejado de los parques, mas de 20 minutos, yo estuve en la zona de lake buena vista la ultima vez y me parecio la mejor zona para disfrutar orlando, pero si no les molesta manejar vale la pena porque esta muy bueno el lugar y esta a buen precio y hay pocos lugares con tres dormitorios como este. cualquier duda que tengan escribanme y con gusto les contare mas detalles,suerte que lo disfruten!!!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We stayed here the first two weeks in April and the location is perfect. It's an easy commute to all of the theme parks and everything you need is right on your door step (eg - Chilli's, McD's, Publix etc...). We stayed in a 3 bedroom condo in block two which, was plenty big enough for us. The decor is quite dated but, who cares, you're on holiday!!! In between our visits to the theme parks, our kids (12 & 9) played endlessly in the large pool whilst we chilled on the comfy sun loungers!!! At the bar there are three large screen TV's showing various sports including English football - thanks for putting the Burnley game on one of the TV's, we didn't do it against Middleboro but, we got over the line against Wigan to get to the Premier League - bring it on!!!We ate at the restaurant at the resort quite often. The food was very reasonably priced and we all had a great meal every visit - you have to try the 'Chilli Fries'. The service in the restaurant and bar was excellent and all of the staff are very friendly.The only reason we didn't rate this resort 'excellent' is because we couldn't get into our room with our key four times in four days. This is the last thing that you need in a heat wave and this was a common occurrence amongst fellow guests. It also took two days to get the WiFi that we had paid for. To be fair The young gentlemen (Andre?) in reception managed to sort out both of our issues but, we felt some of the other members of the reception staff just 'fobbed us off'.If the resort can sort out these two common issues then the feedback on this resort will be very different and the standards would then be in line with the bar and restaurant.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: This was our second time in Tuscana. We paid a little extra to be closer to the pool (which we did not use at the end), but it is worth it to be closer to the main gate and the front desk. We stayed for 7 nights and everything was wonderful. The suite was clean, bathrooms worked fine and all equipment worked OK. The only thing I would recommend would be to ask for extra towels. The quality and quantity was not that good. The hotel is 10 minutes away from the parks and it has a Publix, Wallgreens and Chilis right outside the premises. Overall, I will stay again there and I definitely recommend it!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Just spent 2 weeks here and my family and I absolutely loved it. My daughter made so many friends whilst we stayed here which made her first experience abroad one she will never forget. Perfect location for Disney. Everyone so friendly and helpful. Will definitely be returning next year. Thank you all.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Excellent, one very pleasant week at the Tuscana Resort with my wife, my 2 sons y my fathers, so 6 people !! The room was lovely and well equipped, the staff were very friendly and helpful and the pool is just lovely - Nilda was excellent !!! !) the kids (7 and 4 years old) really loved and enjoy the pool. The resort is also very close to all the parks and has plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. We would stay here again and we recommend it !!!
column59: San Fernando del Valle de Catamarca, Argentina

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We recently spent three very pleasant weeks over the Easter holidays at the Tuscana Resort and this being our eight trip to Orlando I can happily say the Tuscana is the best we stayed in. The room was lovely and well equipped, the staff were very friendly and helpful and the pool is just lovely - the cabanas are a great touch if it gets too hot!!. The food at the pool was really good and reasonably priced and the daily happy hour went down well. (well we are Irish!) The resort itself has a good atmosphere and the kids really loved it they made plenty of friends. The resort is also very close to all the parks and has plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We spent two weeks over Easter as Tuscana and had a great holiday. The resort is easy to locate and sign posted off the I4 - a help on your first day in the US! Our apartment was spacious and well equiped - nothing was missing from our inventory and all kitchen equipment was clean. Plus there was a dish cloth a small supply of dishwasher powder etc. Beds were large and comfy, TVs throughout plus good sized bathrooms, walk in closets etc.Proximity to Disney is brilliant, it never took longer than 10 minutes between the hotel and Disney Gateway. As the hotel is located south of Disney you don't hit the International Drive traffic until you head to Universal via that route. There is a Publix supermarket at the end of the drive, plus a petrol station, mexican and italian restaurants and a McDonalds! If you want a Walmart then it is only two junctions up the I4.We had a couple of reasons to call out maintainence; once the door keys wouldn't work and on another occassion the air conditioning stopped. On the first occassion it took 20 minutes and another call for someone to arrive, however the next time we had someone with us within 10 minutes and both problems were resolved 5 minutes later.The pool area was good, spacious pool, plenty of loungers and shade. The hotel was pretty full when we were there but the pool area never felt that busy. We didn't use the snack menu or restaurant but looking at the food delivered to some guests dining outside on the terrace, the food looked great and the menu was pretty extensive and reasonably priced.There is a down side and that is the wi-fi. We'd read other reviewers before we arrived, who had mentioned you have to be near the bar to use it. They were not wrong. However all the parks & restaurants have wi-fi so it's not that much of an inconvenience.During the whole 2 weeks we only had one evening when we experienced noise and that was when an apartment of men seemed to have made themselves comfortable in the hallway and they were still having a laugh well after 11pm. Unfortunately the hallway amplified the sound so in the end we gave security a call. They came out and had a quiet word and we heard nothing more.This is a well kept and well located resort. We have no hesitation recommending it and when we return for another Orlando holiday we will probably stay here again.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: QUITE GOOD BUT THEY NEED TO CHECK EQUIPMENT MORE OFTEN
column29: We have just returned from Tuscana resort after staying there for 2 week. Our apartment was in block 1 on top floor as requested I emailed resort prior to travelling and they provided us with room request. The apartment was a bit dated but spacious and clean. We were several items missing from the inventory provided the most important items being the grill pan and baking tray as there was nothing to use to cook in the oven. We bought a few aluminim trays from dollar shop to use. I know these apartments are self catering but surely they should supply a dish cloth and pan scrubber as standard, they supply face cloths so why not kitchen cloths, We have often stayed in villas and they have always had a good supply of tea towels and dish cloths, again dollar shop.We found all the staff there to be helpfull and effiecient and we had no problem in renting a modem to use.We did have a couple of noisy nights with neighbors but realsise that everyone was there on holiday and it was not constant or every night.The pool area was clean and well kept and the free cabanas ideal for keeping out of the sun at lunch time. On the whole we had an enjoyable stay and would go back again.Oh one more thing the beds were very comfortable which in the past have spoilt many holiday for me.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Have stayed here four times in six years, the most recent was last month, and will almost certainly be back.Great apartments, exceptional value, all well equipped, especially those that are newly refurbished, such as we had last time.Only ten minutes from Disney and twenty from Universal, SeaWorld and I-Drive, it is perfectly situated for all the main attractions. There are two supermarkets within five minutes as well as a number of good restaurants, such as Chilis just off the resort.Great pool, good bar and decent tavern for food, all mean this resort is a great venue for families in the Orlando area.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Muito bom para famílias. Ficamos num apartamento com 3 quartos e conforto para 6 pessoas. Excelente piscina com jacuzzi e bar. O condomínio tem um restaurante próprio. O apartamento tem tudo que é necessário para se sentir em casa. Ótimo!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Great facilities and well located for the parks.....
column29: We stayed at the Tuscana Resort and found the apartment to be well appointed and situated.The staff were very friendly and the resort was well located for all the theme parks.There was a local shopping Mall and restaurants close by making it the ideal place to relax after long days in the parks.........

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estuvimos hospedados 6 adultos y mi hija de 3 años. Nos dieron un departamento de 3 habitaciones, 2 baños, uno en suite, cocina completa, living y living comedor.Un balcón que daba al bosque. Muy tranquilo y silencioso.El Resort es hermoso, ardillas que se pasean por la zona de pileta... La pileta es climatizada y se encuentra al lado del lobby, que es el unico lugar donde hay wi fi. Las habitaciones no cuentan con wi fi, te alquilan uno, desconozco el precio, porque llevamos notebook y hay un cable de red... compartis internet y listo.Muy limpio todo, nuevo, el personal muy amable y hablan español.A 20 minutos de los parques, de facil acceso, a mts de la autopista.100% recomdable, volveria sin dudarlo.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Excelente opcion para estar cerquita de los parques!!
column29: Elegi el complejo por sus servicios y el precio de la estadia.El departamento estuvo excelente, super equipado. la pileta super limpia. No tiene ningun servicio de hotel pero fue realmente excelente en cuanto a la tranquidad y la comodidad!!Ciento por ciento recomendable!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Great price but you get what you pay for.
column29: We spent 4 days at this resort there were 5 adults in a 3 Bedroom unit.The living room area is way too small for 5 adults.The location was good and pool area great. We payed for an upgraded room but couldn't see where the extra money went. We were in the 2000 Building. When we asked about WiFi, we were told that we had to rent a router for an extra charge but they didn't have one available, We had to wait a day to get one and run to the desk in the morning before they were all spoken for. There was no newspaper available. There were no weights or weight machines in the gym. It shouldn't be classified as a gym in my opinion. The decor is very early 90's and seems quite dated and tired. The kitchen was not properly stocked. it had no toaster, baking dish or broiler. I called down and they were quickly supplied.The twin beds in the 3rd room are not suitable for 6 ft young men. their feet hung over the end of the beds which did not make for a great sleep.The bedroom curtains are not functional just decorative so the only black out is very cheap blinds which didn't work very well.We had to call 3 times about noisy neighbors upstairs.We nicked named them the rhinos for their heavy pounding and jumping from 7 am to 11 pm. I had specifically asked for an upper floor when I reserved through Expedia but was given 2nd floor.Having said all this I found this place to be a great value and close to groceries and highway cut off.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We stayed for 2 weeks in April and it was a fantastic experience. The overall layout of the resort was comfortable and spacious and the apartments were top notch. The staff we extremely courteous and helpful and overall there was a very calm atmosphere throughout. We had 2 children with us and the spacious 2bed/2bath apartment was clean , spacious and comfortable. The resort has all the amenities you would expect and a fine pool and bar area. The location is convenient for all the parks and a welcome calm to the frenetic pace at some of the theme park resorts. Some restaurants, supermarkets and conveniences nearby too within walking distance. We will be back for sure.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Fantastic condo at a great price.
column29: We stayed here for 1 week in March 2014 with 4 adults and a child and couldn’t be happier. We go to Orlando every year and stay at a different resort and this is the first time we will be returning to the same place and feel this was the best accommodation we have stayed in yet. We had a 2 bedroom which was very spacious and was very clean. Kitchen was very well equipped. Reception was very friendly and helpful. Pool area was fantastic, our child loved it, especially being able to use it in the evenings. We felt very safe. We used Publix supermarket, which is round the corner where the staff went out of their way to help you. When we come back we would not hesitate to use Tuscana again.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms

column29: The three bed room condo was beautiful and roomy! The beds were very comfortable! My family enjoyed the pool area. The staff was not that warm and inviting from check in to check out!! Bar staff was boarder line rude! But it was over looked!!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: We have visited Florida over 30 times in the last 20 years so we have stayed at many places in and around Orlando.I can honestly say the holiday we have just come back from at Tuscana is one of the best. The apartment was clean stocked with all the equipment you would ever need.The beds clean and comfortable.pool warm and plenty of seats.We had a lovely meal at the pool area and reasonably priced to . The staff we found to be friendly and helpful,from the office staff to the maintenance man.I realize some of the apartments are privately owned and maybe not to the standard that we had but Tuscana should be allowed to sort out any genuine complaint while you are on holiday with them.after reading some of the letters before we went ,l was wondering if I had chosen the wrong accommodation. We would go back to Tuscana and to anyone who has booked a holiday there .you lucky people .

column29: es ideal para descansar...muy limpio...seguro..perecto para ir a los juegos.nosotros eramos 7 adultos, las comodidades fueron excelentes.muy linda la pileta pero no fuimos,no dan los tiempos.precio y calidad genial!!!!...

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Please be aware that this is not a positive review. Day 1, we slept in the rental car because the sheets on the bed appeared to already have been slept on and dirty, so we had to wash them. We got in very late from our activities on Wednesday so we were too tired to wait for the sheets to wash and dry so we just took a loss and slept in the van. I did call the front desk, I did not get an answer so I left a message on the voice mail, they never returned my call. Also after taking off the sheets and pillowcases to wash them, the mattress pads were dirty, there was a blood stained pillow, which was very visible by the way, and a urine stained pillow, both of which should have been disposed of when the housekeeper saw the stains and I have pictures to prove it. That's very unsanitary. Housekeeping did not come the entire time we were there to replenish towels, tissue, etc. The dryer stopped working, there were black bugs in one of the beds, one of the shower floors was just outright filthy and the curtains in the living room were dirty as well. The filth of this place played an important role in my decision whether or not to purchase a timeshare. If I were an owner I would be quite upset that my place was not being kept up to par. The guests above us had children that ran, fumbled and bumped from sun up to sun down, basically all day and all night, it was quite nerve wrecking. My complaints could go on and on but I'll end it here. This was an overall horrible stay and I doubt that I will travel with this company again.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column27: Perfect Family Holiday at Walt Disney World
column29: We just arrived back from 2 weeks holiday at a condo at the Tuscana Resort in Davenport in Orlando. It was a perfect holiday in every way, the appartment was spacious and homely, location was brilliant at 15 mins door to door to the parks with easy drive up the I4, staff at the resort were lovely and helpful (no idea where the criticisms on here come from) and the pool area and bar are spotless and very pretty. It was a special anniversary for us and staff had kindly left us a bottle of bubbly and chocolate which was very kind and really made our day! I'd recomment ths resort as a base for WDW - I was a bit worried before we arrived as I thought Davenport was miles and miles away from the action but the proximity to the I4 made it absolutely brilliant; driving was a pleasure.

column29: My family stayed for 2 weeks we ended up staying 2 more days. The condo was very clean and spacious, only minutes to the parks and malls. It has a big and beautiful pool with restaurant and bar. They have live band every other night during our stay. The place is pet friendly. Its a gated resort, right outside is the convenient stores and restaurants. Its very affordable for a new place. I would love to go back to this place in the future. This place is highly rec commended for travelers, family and friends! Pets are welcome!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Overall, this is a nice condo resort. It is clean and well cared for. Our condo had 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a nice size kitchen, dining, living room open area. It also has a screened in balcony.Some things that need consideration...1. there is only one pool for 8 or 9 buildings. If you arrive mid-afternoon, you may not get a chair at the pool2. having a bar and restaurant at the pool is nice but... it means that you cannot bring your own food and drinks3. Noisy at night. We were in building 2 facing the parking lot. I think the back of the building and a higher floor would be quiet4. buildings 8 and nine are very close to a major highway5. some buildings are far from the pool area. Plan appropriately if you have health issues or young children in tow

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We were on our way to Costa Rica and had never been to Florida so we found Tuscana through our time share. Very nice property. We were on the 4th floor which I happen to think is the best because there is no one above you making noise. Had very little to do with the staff...office or othrwise. but the office staff was a little stuffy. Seemed like they were there to sell property not to make staying guests comfortable. The property is so very centrally located we went to Central Business District...Universal Studios, Bubba Gumps, Hard Rock the night we got there. Epcot Center twice, Downtown Disney, The Kennedy Space Center & the Tampa Hard Rock. And still had a few days of down time to prepare to go to Costa Rica. The property is very nice. It is not a HOTEL. These are individually owned condos which you have to provide everything including salt & pepper, laundry supplies,electric dish soap & garbage bags. They have washer & dryers in each unit so you can do your own clothes & linens. Pool towels are provided so you are not resposible for washing those. Just be sure to go to a store & pick up everything you would need to eat for the same amount of days at home. We have our own moble 4-g wi-fi hot spot so not having wi-fi provided by properties is not a problem for us. It is worth the price through our carrier to have this everywhere that has a cell system.Rooms were very comfortable. Had extra bedding because we did not use the sofa as a bed. Never had time to spend at the pool but sure saw a lot of people using it. One really nice thing about the property is that every unit had a balcony/patio which was enclosed with screen. LOVED that. NO bugs. Also made it a little bit more private. Plenty of parking.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Awesome bar and restaurant staff at Tuscana Resorts...
column29: Tuscana resorts is a beautiful resort in davenport Florida that is very close to all the parks and attractions! The pool is clean and beautiful with lots of loungers and gazebo's for you and your family to enjoy a day at the pool! The bar and restaurant staff are fantastic ESPECIALLY Jenny(bar manager), and Janet (restaurant/bar owner/operator). They really made our family's stay that much better, they remembered us from previous years and how we liked our drinks!! Food is always good and cooked to your likings and fast. If it was not for Jenny and Janet making our stay enjoyable, and like our home away from home we most likely would find somewhere else to go with our growing group of 40+ because the front desk staff are HORRIBLE. AWFUL service any front desk personnel I had to deal with was rude, lazy and did nothing to help me. Tuscana I suggest you keep JENNY THE BARTENDER FOREVER. If you don't plan on hiring respectful front desk staff! She will be your only saving grace to keep your guests coming back! You have been lucky to find her, she truly is a fantabulous bartender/waitress!!!

Próximo a estrada 4, é longe do aeroporto e centro de Orlando, mas achegada nos parques da Disney é feita em 15 minutos.

column27: muy lindo lugar para descanzar despues de los parques
column29: es un condominio, con lo cual no hay servicios de hotelería, pero el lugar y la tranquilidad son su principales puntos a favor, nosotros somos 2 mayores y en nene de 7 años y nos dieron un departamento con 2 habitaciones en el cual se podían hospedar tranquilamente 5 personas, las 2 habitaciones con vestidor y en suite, la cocina totalmente completa y equipada muy amplia, también cuenta con lava y seca ropas en el dto.el personal muy amable todos hablan español, un punto aparte para la sra NILDA quien estuvo bien predispuesta para solucionar un problema que surgió al final de la estadía.sin lugar a dudas es un lugar totalmente recomendable al cual seguramente volveré.a la entrada del complejo hay: 7 eleven, mc donald's, publix, walgreens, y está a menos de 15 minutos de los parques de Disney.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Great spot for a home away from home!
column29: The only thing preventing us from giving this a "5" is the lack of internet access in the rooms; and the difficulty getting necessary answers after-hours. The units are clean, comfortable, and well-laid out. The check-in staff were very friendly and helpful; although we dealt with one snooty girl on the phone. We really weren't at the resort much, but it was quiet (except for the last night which had a lot of drunken noise outside the building into the wee hours), beautiful, and well-maintained. The pool is very warm and a great atmosphere. They don't provide a dishcloth or garbage bags so it may be a good idea to bring them with you. The only real reason we won't return is because of the lack of free internet access in the units (but if you don't require it, this is a top notch place to stay!!

column29: Los departamentos son muy amplios, comodos y completos. Es muy seguro y tiene todos los servicios. El barrio es muy tranquilo, tiene mac donald s , publix , chilis , estacion de servicio ... todo en la entrada al complejo , y esta a minutos de los parques disney.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: El mejor lugar que podria haber elegido
column29: Hola Viajeros. Les cuento la verdad como a mi me gustaria que me la digan al elegir un hotel. Este lugar no tiene ni un detalle en contra! Es amplio, impecable, bien decorado, seguro, nuevo. Nos alojamos en un departamento de dos habitaciones cada una con baño pirvado y enorme vestidor. Las camas muy comodas y limpias. Tenes estacionamiento y no tenes que pagar aparte. La cocina tiene todo lo que necesitas. Vajilla, lava vajilla, lavarropas. Estuvimos mas comodos que en casa. La ubicacion es excelente, estas a 10 minutos de los parques de disney!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
