column29: Lugar sensacional, melhor local para ficar em ORlando! Pertos dos parques e outltes o lugar dispõe de fácil acesso a I4 com restaurante Chillis, ampm, walgreens a 500m.Tranquilo e sossegado apartamento super bem equipado.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Es un resort impecable. Quien piense que va a un hotel, está equivocado. Son departamentos con TODO lo que una familia necesita. Cocina con todo lo necesario, calefacción y refrigeración central, tranquilo, apartado, funcionó absolutamente todo a la perfección.Si mi familia quisiera viajar nuevamente a Orlando, mi condición sería alojarme nuevamente allí.Algunos se quejan de la limpieza, pero al ser un departament, debe hacerla uno mismo, sin nadie que interfiera en horarios para ingresar.Nosotros fuimos 5 (matrimonio con 3 hijas) y la hemos pasado de maravilla.No encuentro nada negativo. (tal vez lo de llevar la basura, pero aprovechábamos para caminar un poco). Cada cosa tiene su lado positivo.Vovería sin dudarlo. Espero volver pronto. Extraño todas las atracciones del viaje y Tuscana, fue una de ellas.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Excelente opción para familias con niños pequeños. No es un hotel, sino algo más parecido a alquilar un departamento. No hay servicio de limpieza, lo cual es perfecto para quienes salimos corriendo para aprovechar lo más posible el día en los parques: no importa si queda desordenado, nadie entra en la habitación. Muy amplio, muy completa la cocina, lo cual permite ahorrar mucho en comidas, sobre todo con niños, muy útil también disponer de lavarropas y secarropas para salir del paso. Te dan lo básico en cuanto a detergente, jabón, etc como para arrancar, si necesitás más durante la estadía tenés un centro comercial muy muy cerca para comprar todo lo necesario. Muy linda la pileta, el entorno natural súper pacífico pero a tan sólo 15/ 20 minutos de los parques Disney y Universal. Y más cerca de Legoland que la mayoría de los alojamientos de la zona. Sólo mejoraría que haya wi fi en las habitaciones también, hoy sólo hay disponibilidad en recepción y zona de bar y pileta. Volvería sin dudas!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Rude front desk & mildew/mold in bathtub
column29: Upon arrival the front desk was rude. They did not greet me & I definitely did not feel welcomed. For that alone I would never stay there again. If I could have cancelled my reservations without a penalty I would have right on the spot. The room was very nice & it was pretty spacious. The bathtub had mold & mildew which grossed us out. I had to buy bleach to clean it myself. I would have made the maid clean it except there really isn't a maid service & I didn't want to get charged for having the maid come to clean it. If you want a maid to come & clean your room I believe there is a $50 charge. If you want clean towels it's a $20 charge. Other than the mildew tub the room was pretty clean. Make sure not to leave trash in the room or you'll get charged for trash. The pool area was nice. The pool is definitely not heated. They do have a few heated vents at the bottom of the pool but the water was freezing even in 75 degree weather. They do have karaoke on Thursday & Saturday nights. Not going to lie karaoke night was pretty fun. All in all it was an okay resort. I definitely would not stay there again. I could have looked passed the mildew in the bathroom but the rude staff is a different story.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Departamento con dos habitaciones grandes y confortables, dos baños en suite, cocina completa e inpecable. Todo nuevo. El complejo esta a 8 cuadras de un centro comercial. Aprox a 20km de los parques. Ofrece pileta de gran tamaño climatizada, restauran y un bar pintorezco con precios acordes. Blance positivo .Wifi solo en la pileta y bar, no en la habitacion.Volveria

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estuvimos en el Tuscana en febrero 2014, con niños grandes. Hermoso lugar. Cerca de los parques, cómodo, amplio, confortable. Las instalaciones de primer nivel. El lobby y área de pileta bellísimo, bien equipado, muy bien mantenido. Impecable. Los apartamentos enormes, con todas las comodidades. No hay servicio de mucama incluído, pero, a nosotros no nos hizo falta. Tiene todo lo necesario y más. La atención del personal es excelente y muy amable. Había leído que algunos viajeros tuvieron problemas con la tarjeta magnética. Nosotros también, pero el cerrajero llegó en menos de 10 minutos. El acceso a la autopista es inmediato, y si bien está a 10/15 minutos de los parques, lo cierto es que por el lugar donde se encuentra, no se pasa por ningún nudo de tránsito. Antes de entrar hay estación de servicio, Wallgreen y Publix, para proveerse de todo lo ncesario. Si bien nos aclararon que W FI sólo había en áreas comunes, como estabámos en el Edificio 2, cerca de la recepción tuvimos señal sin problemas.- Volvería y lo recomiendo.-

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Reservarmos este resort por meio de uma agência de turismo e no início achamos um pouco estranho o conceito, mas é muito simples.Nós alugamos um apartamento de 2 quartos, mas recebemos um de 3 quartos. O resort, funciona como um aluguel de temporada. Você pega o cartão, assina um contrato recebe as chaves e durante o período você tem acesso ao apartamento. Não há serviço de quarto, não há limpeza, troca de toalhas ou coisa assim. Você retira o seu próprio lixo, lava as próprias louças, faz as camas, etc.Cada apartamento possui água quente, cozinha completa com forno, fogão, geladeira, microondas, lava louças, máquina de lavar e de secar, ar condicionado, varanda.O local é bem seguro e próximo da Disney, porém fica a cerca de 20-30 minutos do centro de Orlando, sendo assim se você possui muitos assuntos nesta região, este pode não ser o melhor resort. O acesso a rodovia é fácil e possui um publix bem perto.Indico fortemente para famílias com crianças pequenas, pessoas que pretendam ficar vários dias na cidade, pessoas que prefiram cozinhar e grupos de casais que possam dividir o apartamento.Dica: Ao sair, retire todo o lixo do apartamento, pois eles cobram uma taxa de retirada do lixo. Existem containers na propriedade onde o lixo pode ser depositado.Existem supermercados perto, mas se for chegar tarde da noite, recomendo comprar comida ao menos para o café da manhã em algum supermercado 24 horas.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: The place is really nice for a family trip!The room is huge, and confortable, but our room was a littler dusty...Unfortunatelly the people that work there, they really don´t like what they do and make the Hotel a bad place to stay!...Some of the terrible services:- I asked about some more pillows, and one extra matress, because the sofa bed was really bad. The front desk, after I insisted a lot, gave me a phone number to call... They don´t care about anything that you may need...- I made an order online and asked the first day I arrived to check the mail, because It would have a package for me. After three consecutive days checking my mail, they always saying that there was no package for me... The last night that I was there and the tracking for courier showing that the package was delivered, I insisted with front desk and after a long time they saw my package... When I checked delivery date, the package was there for a few days...- At the first night of 10 that my family and I would stay there, we had a problem with the key. The card reader wasn´t working and I went to front desk (that works only till 10:30 pm) and explain my problem. We had just arrived from a long day at the park, with three kids and one elder in our family, and the lady at the front desk didn´t say good night and said that I would wait for the maintenance for repair. The problem was the face of her, answering me like @#!@, and didn´t pick-up a phone to call somebody... I was really angry and said that I wouldn´t leave with an estimate of time, because I have three kids and one elder, hungry, tired and she didn´t give a @#@$!...- No breakfast, even the restaurant inside the hotel... That´s ok that the hotel says that doesn´t include breakfast, but the restaurante opened all days that we stayed there after 10:30am and the owner (the guy, not the lady) is not nice... not even a little nice!... What the hell is he doing owning a restaurant... He has no idea how about to be nice...Well... these are a few problems that we had and I´m really tired to write all the things that happened...But if you want a cheap place for all your family (I stay with 8), it´s a good location, but do NOT count with ANY KIND of SERVICE!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Beautiful space, a little out of the way from disney
column29: Great for families. Updated suites with all amenities one would find at home. Great pool and clubhouse. A little out of the way from disney, especially if you come to the room in the middle of the day. Would stay there again.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Large and Clean, Close to Attractions, Quiet at Night
column29: We stayed in building 5, which it turned out was a perfect distance from the noise of the freeway and the activity of the pool and entry/exit area. I read other reviews of the staff being rude and keys not working but our experience was fine and utterly normal.We appreciated the large size of our 2 bedroom/2 bath unit. In fact, after taking an overnight trip to Clearwater Beach (highly recommended btw, DO NOT GO to Cocoa Beach, $15 in tolls!!) and staying in a normal sized hotel room (La Quinta), stepping back into our Tuscana pad felt like Buckingham Palace.Just a great place to return every evening with the kids and decompress after the gulag of the many many close attractions. Ok, I'm whining needlessly! Seriously, the place is so quiet I could hear the tee shots of the golfers off the tee box 200 yards away from the balcony. We will return, I only hope it's sooner rather than later. By the way, we were there the first 2 weeks of February 2014, and the weather was sublime. And the kids loved the pool.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Sin dudar volvería a quedarme y prolongar aún la estadía. Estuve con mi familia del 17 al 23 de Enero del 2014. No tiene contras:Buena ubicación, fácil acceso a parques y sitios de compras. Instalaciones completas, ambientes amplios y limpios.El costo es muy bajo y la atención muy buena.No se lo pierdan

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Had to travel to Orlando on Business with a coworker, and we decided to go on Priceline to see if we could get a nicer property than the hotels that were fitting into our budget.We bid, and won this hotel, and since I used to live in Davenport, I was happy since I was familiar with the Championsgate area already. Check in had no issues, and they let me check in early, however, there was a $37 housekeeping fee that was not disclosed by Priceline when we checked in.Our unit, #6107 unit was beautiful, it was a two bedroom unit with two full bathrooms, and it was very very clean. Everything seemed to work fine, but, it was a bit disappointing that, despite the $37 fee, we were provided with very small no name soaps, and only one roll of toilet paper per restroom.I would stay here again,, but,, would try and pay a little less than I did on Priceline,, now knowing what I know.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Muy buen alojamiento precio-calidad, pero podria mejorarse mucho con muy poco
column29: Pasamos 8 noches con mi familia, y la verdad es que resulto muy comodo. Eramos 4 (2 mayores y 2 niños) y el lugar es sumamente grande, con una cocina-sala, 2 habitaciones, 2 baños completos, y todo lo que se necesita para disfrutar Orlando: lavarropas, secarropas, lavavajillas, etc.No hay servicio de mucama, pero uno esta poco en el hotel y casi no ensucia, hay aspiradora por si alguno es muy maniatico de la limpieza.Tiene una linda pileta (casi no la usamos) y un bar para tomar algo a la noche o cenar o desayunar si quieren, que tampoco usamos.Tambien tiene un gimnasio que es correcto, con 3 cintas para correr, otras tantas bicicletas y algun aparato multiple. Si son los que no abandonan el ejercisio ni siquiera en vacaciones, el gimanasio les va a servir de ayuda, y tambien al estar en medio de una zona boscosa, esta bueno para salir a correr por los caminos internos, casi sin trafico.La atencion es correcta, no sobra nada pero tampoco falta nada.Ventajas:- Grande y comodo- Excelente precio comparado con Resorts similares- Estacionamiento incluido- Dejan recibir paquetes que uno encarga por Amazon o similar.- Incluye internet solo por cable en las habitaciones- Wifi en la zona de pileta.- Dejan imprimir sin cargo tickets o cualquier cosa que uno necesite imprimir de ultimo momento (para mi fue muy comodo, ya que hay muchos tickets que podes imprimirlos por tu cuenta y llevarlos).- check in y check out perfectos, sin sorpresas de tarifas ni gastos no anunciados.- IMPORTANTE PARA TENER EN CUENTA SI ESTAN COMPARANDO RESORTS CON OTROS SIMILARES: NO COBRAN RESORT FEE !!! Tengan en cuenta esto, ya que la mayoria si lo hacen (alrededor de 10 dolares por dia por adulto) y generalmente esta en letra chica y uno no lo sabe hasta que paga su cuenta al final de la estadia.Desventajas:- No hay Wifi en las habitaciones, hoy es dia es fundamental para conectar diferentes aparatos.- Muy malo el sistema de oscuricimiento de las habitaciones. Para los que les gusta dormir totalmente oscuros como yo, aca la van a pasar mal, por mas colchas o frazadas que intenten poner para tapar la entrada de luz. Solo hay un sistema de cortinas americanas, que no sirve para nada. Recomendaria que coloquen cortinas black out encima de estas.- Las camas son chicas, cada cuarto tiene 2 camas matrimoniales de no mas de 1,40 o a lo sumo 1,50 de ancho, incomodas.- Para peor las sabanas que usan son cortas, o sea que se que salen del colchon y uno tiene que elegir taparse de la mitad para arriba o de la mitad para abajo, porque no alcanza para todo el cuerpo.- A pesar que la cocina viene bien equipada con utensillos que se necesitan para vivir, los mismos son demasiados justos, podrian tener un poco mas de cantidad de platos, cubiertos, algunos elementos mas de cocina, etc.- La ubicacion no es la mejor, queda un poco lejos de todos los parques, no es grave, pero siempre hay que andar por lo menos 20 minutos para ir a un parque. Se simplifica porque todo es a la vera de la autopista I4 que es donde se encuentra el hotel, que es muy agil y rapida, pero un dia de embotellamiento el tiempo se hace mas largo. No descartaria el hotel por la distancia, pero tomen en cuenta que van a gastar mas nafta.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Nuestra estadía en el Tuscana fue una excelente experiencia;allí encontramos tranquilidad, orden, organización, limpieza, excelente atención y el departamento realmente en condiciones impecables,con vajilla,elementos de cocina,lavadora,secadora y todo lo necesario para la estadía en impecables condiciones.-Una pileta hermosa y grande, una excelente vista a un campo de golf y laguna.-Y de destacar la atención de Gloria en la recepción del Hotel, realmente muy eficiente en su trabajo.- Lo recomendamos,toda la familia.-Nos encantaría volver en otra oportunidad.-

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: This property is a former apartment complex. You will need to go to the local supermarket for amenities normally provided daily for no fee. Close to the freeway and a few eating spots. You will have to take out your trash to the dumpsters provided. Some leave their trash where it sits outside the units.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: precio caliad excelente para quedarse en orlando
column29: El lugar tiene departamentos muy buenos, granes con os baño y una cocina maravillosamente equipada con lava y seca ropa.Todas las unidaes tienen balcon done sentarse a desayunar.La decoracion es un poco anticuada pero la limpieza y la ubicacion son excelentes

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Es un hermoso lugar, tiene una muy buena ubicación, los apartamentos son muy grandes y cómodos, el lugar es muy aseado, muy buena atención de las personas, nosotros llegamos ya más tarde de la hora en la que teníamos que registrarnos y nos ayudaron con eso sin ningún problema.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Ótimos apartamentos para quem vai com a família. Um pouco mais distante, mas com a qualidade das rodovias de Orlando, nada de mais. O serviço de limpeza não está incluso. Vc mesmo deve arrumar e limpar tudo, ou solicitar housekeeping por uma taxa adicional. Fizemos uma solicitação no meio da estadia. Muito recomendado.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: No es un hotel. Alquilamos por Homeaway y el precio variaba bastante respecto de los de la pagina. La estadia fue excelente. Reciben paquetes en la conserjeria para quiene hagan compras desde el exterior. Tienen un bar al lado de la pileta con comidas rapidas, muy comodo para llegar y no cocinar. Tiene facil acceso a la autopista, por lo que es comodo llegar a los parques.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: En primer lugar para destacar la ubicación. Comparado con otros resorts que están cercanos a Downtown Disney en el mapa parece realmente lejano. Sin embargo son menos de 15 minutos de la entrada a los parques.Respecto de las unidades son cómodas y espaciosas y están equipadas con lo indispensable para mantener una familia de hasta seis personas durante una semana.Sin embargo tanto en el complejo, como en las unidades o el equipamiento estan un escalon abajo de, por ejemplos, los complejos de Diamond como el Grande Vilas resort.Pero por suerte esto ultimo tambien se refleja a la hora de la cuenta.En resumen: una muy buena opcion para quien viaja a Orlando con un grupo familiar de 4 personas o mas.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: El lugar es excelente, pero es un condominio, no un hotel. Si queres la limpieza diaria debes agregarle u$s 45 por dia. no hay cambio de toallas ni sabanas. tenes que lavarlas vos. ( la lavadora espectacular: pero no voy de vacaciones para lavar!!!)No te dan ni el papel higienico. ni los elementos de limpieza.No volvería. tal vez yo NO ENTENDI que en realidad NO ERA un apart hotel...o la dif que tendria que pagar para que lo fuera. No era para 5 personas<: el sofa cama era espantoso!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column27: cómodo pero sin servicio de limpieza
column29: el checK in ágil pero no muy cordial, las habitaciones son amplias porque es un condominio, no un hotel. el mobiliario es viejo y en estado de conservación regular. la ubicación es regular, no está muy cerca de los parques y si te da hambre por la noche, sólo hay una o dos opciones cerca. alquilamos un apartamento con dos recámaras y cada una tiene su baño. El servicio de limpieza, si no quieres pasar tus vacaciones limpiando, se paga ahí por separado y es muy caro.no recomiendo este alojamiento.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We stayed 7 nights at Tuscana resort and was positiv suprised of the standard. We stayed in a big apartment with two sleeps and two bathrooms. Well maintained and practical layout. washer and dryer in the apartment as well as fullly equipped kitchen. The pool area is vey nice. we had to change room due to we where placed on the ground floor with big air condition units just 1 meter from our terrace.! Very noisy. Very strange that they construct a layout where 1/3 of the ground floor apartment get this problem. The change was not a problem and the staff was helpful.If I shall comment anything negativ it have to be training of the staff. Both in the reception and the people working with maintenance etc. It was quite obvious that they where not trained how to interact with the guests. The reception people where nice, but the staff working around at the premises behaved like the guests did not exist. They did not greet you, and was driving like maniacs with their small eletrical cars. Not a big problem, but very noticable when you are there. All in all we had a nice stay, and really felt we got a lot of value for the money. If you want to see racoons, go out with the garbage after dark. They are luscing around or inside the garbage containers.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estuve en Tuscana Resort en Diciembre '13. La atención es muy buena, esta cerca de los parques y cuenta con todos los servicios. Desde la contratación aclaran que no es un hotel, por lo tanto puedes disfrutar un departamento dentro de un condominio con la privacidad y tranquilidad que ello implica.Las habitaciones son grandes, cómodas, limpias y muy funcionales.Cada habitación tiene baño y vestidor. La cocina es grande y cuenta con todo lo necesario.La pileta tiene agua a temperatura adecuada y pudimos disfrutarla hasta de noche.La limpieza se abona aparte, pero como estuvimos 12 noches, el Resort se hizo cargo.No dudaría en volver!! Ojalá pueda hacerlo pronto!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Fomos como toda a família, pais, filhos, netos, agregados, amigos, enfim, quase 30 pessoas, ficamos em 5 apartamentos, cada família tem sua privacidade, e na hora das festas juntava todo mundo num apto só!! Perfeito para quem gosta de festar!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estuvimos en el Tuscana este diciembre,2013. Todos nos aconsejaban estar en los resorts de Disney y sin embargo apostamos por este resort a diez minutos de todos los parques. No nos equivocamos! Inmejorable ubicación, de los parques,de los shopping Premium. Dos cuartos con baños en suite, cocina a full. Pileta con jacussi y pileta para niños, bar con comidas rápidas si no queres cocinar. todo en un ambiente de paz y tranquilidad no se escucha un sonido. Lo malo (hay algo malo!?) llevar la basura a dos cuadras de tu departamento, hay un costo de cincuenta dólares si no llevas la basura a su lugar, pero podes hacer de llevar la basura un momento de relax, porque vas bordeando una reserva ecológica! Un placer nuestra estadía en nuestro "hogar en Orlando".

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We had a 2 bedroom room in building 9302. This building is away from everything, personally did not bother me. The room itself is very spacious. As many state they hold $300 on your card but it is released after you checkout. I checked out a few days ago and I don't see it anymore on my card. There was also a $37 cleaning fee. We did not use any of the amenities such as pool and bar as we were mostly here to sleep. This property is close to Disney so that was a plus. We did notice a few issues with room itself, garbage disposal did not work, toilet in master bedroom was running, front door and bathroom door knob would get stuck and would not stay shut (had to jiggle door to get it to lock shut). Overall would return and recommend to others.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: Spent a long weekend here with a group who occupied an entire entryway.Condos were nicely furnished, very spacious, but spartanly supplied with consumables: just a tiny flake of soap, one thin roll of TP, and small bottle of detergent.The pool & restaurant were fine but the office was completely incompetent. Business center didn't deserve the name and lack of WiFi a negative.Still excellent value for anyone self sufficient who likes to camp out inluxurious surroundings.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: We were here during the Thanksgiving week, toward the second part of the week. Our 3 bedroom apartment was terrible. The odor was the worse part. Old, with many things not functioning, including the internet connection, the telephone, the kitchen sink faucet. When we checked in, the access key cards didn't work. Beds are small and not comfortable. We were with a group, and I have to say that there is some variance across condos/rooms, since I believe some are privately owned. But relative to price, this is too expensive. I do not recommend it at all.

Além das instalações serem ótimas, o lugar é privilegiado, pois em sua volta tem campo de Golf e rápido acesso aos parques da Disney. Vale à pena conferir esta opção em Davenport - Orlando.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Pros: Large and clean rooms with many services. Nice swimming pool. Well located. Cons: No WiFi on rooms (incredible that this is missing) and front desk availability is very limited. However i would recommend it and i´ll come back.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We just returned from Tuscana Resort. There are some desks that representatives sit behind and will attempt to get up when they "feel" like it. The customer service from the moment you check in is below standard. You are asked for $300 to be put on a credit card, ridiculous. There is no wi-fi any where on the property except at the front desk where the reps sit, even tho they claim it works by the pool area. It never worked for us.My husband walked in to the main building from the pool area and was yelled at to put a shirt on, there were no signs any where indicating that a shirt was required. Again, it is all about customer service and not screaming at a guest. You cannot call room to room or even contact the front desk because the button on the phone that says " front desk" reroutes you to a central number, almost like calling for a taxi. You cannot get a hold of a "live " person. I had to walk down to the front desk which is only open between 8 am - 5 pm!! Are you kidding me?? Upon check out you have to remove all your garbage yourself, which I find ridiculous considering the amount you pay to stay there, with no maid service at all, all week.There is not one person that you see present, that seems to be capable of running the condos. The grounds are very well kept, except the dog poop because animals can stay on the property. The size of the condos are good and they are clean.I would not recommend this resort to anyone who appreciates customer service, it is not here!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Nice resort need a new Front desk manager
column29: Everythings in the resort is fine but only one issue is the Front desk manager she needs more customer services training she is very rude and does not know how to speak to the guests very bad experience with her just beacuse her we are not going back, the Resot it was very cleaned in that part I give them 5stars we had a little incident that ha nothing to do with the housekeeping department but the Manager was passing by and we told her that we had some water in the bathroom floor and she went and clean it herself her name we think is Rebecca we told her that they need more people like her with that type of customer services manners at the front desk. Its sad that we loved the resort but that Front desk manager needs to be replaced.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: This is now the third year on the run we have travelled from England to spend our holiday here.Tuscana is conveniently situated just a short drive into disney just off the i4 yet it is quiet and relaxing after a busy day in the parks . The pool area is great always gets available and the food is ok .. Drinks are a bit pricey tho . We stayed previously and had a few issues with noise from an apartment above from what seemed to be a family who appeared to permanently live there so when I saw some of the recent comments on here about noise levels alarm bells rang in my head so I emailed Toscana and they said they would try to ensure I had a top floor apartment which we had and it was great , three bedrooms but we only paid for a 2 , clean as always, new flat screen tv in lounge and new sofas , tiled floors throughout and fully equipped washer dryer etc. the key cards which seem to be an issue we had problems with too .. It would appear and would have been nice to know this ... Mobile phones wipe them !! So if you store your phone and key card in your bag together it will wipe the card and then a trip to reception to get a new one is required which did happen to us ! Maybe a mention of this to guests may help ? We also had a problem with lights .. Upon returning at approx 10 pm we found the kitchen lights not working after a call to "reception" within half an hour someone came and fixed it .. Brilliant .All in all Toscana offers great value for money in a great location ..... The local restaurant chillis really is that it's blooming freezing in there if you go take a coat or even better do as we did get a carry out !!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Arrived late night, check-in went smoothly, as all instructions about late-night check-in had been given before arrival. The condo was much larger that expected (3 bedr). It has everything you'll need, full equipped kitchen, television in every room and in-condo laundry facilities. Stayed in block 1, next to the pool area, great location, especially in the evening, if you felt to tired to walk over to the bar to listen to some music, you could just sit outside on the porch. We had problems with our Aircon one night, but the maintenance arrived within few minutes and brought it up to work again in no time. Our last day, we had lockout, none of the keys worked, but again the maintenance came to resolve it. Later the same day, we had lockout again, but it took a bit longer time to get it resolved, but in the end the maintenance came and opened for us. It was a bit irritating thing, have to wait outside your condo after a long day out. The whole area was clean and tidy including the pool area, which was frequently enjoyed. Especially during the evening time, where most people are sitting by the bar, you almost have the whole pool by yourself and can have a swim and enjoy a bit of a music at same time. Tuscana is located only minute away from the I-4 exit 58, so it's a great location considered that I-4 runs through the Greater-Orlando are, where all the famous parks, shops, restaurants, etc..., are located. Nearby Tuscana is supermarket, gas station, restaurants etc..., and only ten-minutes drive away you will find larger shopping complex which includes Target, Best Buy plus more chain stores. I will definitely return to Tuscana Resort again next time when I visit Orlando, it is so convenient to have a home away from home, which also is spacious and within few miles from all the best Orlando has to offer. Room was super-clean at arrival, we had order a food pack prior to arrival, which comes in good use if you arrive late, so you don't have to rush into the supermarket the morning after to buy food. Living room has very large flatscreen TV, as well internet cable (which could be slightly longer). Also, the area next to building 3, where the trash containers are located, could have been more clean and have few more containers added, as one day they all were completely full.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: A/C & door key Problems; but nice resort condo!
column29: Our check - in was quite slow apparently due to change over in computer programming. We were issued four keys; but two did not function at all. A/C was not working well and it was quite hot the first night (it was fixed during the day of our 2nd day stay.) The condo was very comfortable and gave us plenty of room for two couples ( 2/2 ). Rooms were clean and enough dishes, utensils, glasses and cooking pots/pans were available if we chose to use them (we did not cook because we were going to the Epcot Food & Wine Festival). The 2nd night we arrived back at our room after 11PM - the other two keys did not function and we had to call an emergency number to help us get into the room. After a 1/2 hour or so wait, a man arrived and opened the door for us. The resort very nicely removed the $37.45 cleaning fee as compensation for our trouble with the A/C and Keys. Additonally I left a hard back book in the room and a resort representative delivered it to UPS for return to me (at my cost). Even with all of this, the very reasonable price might bring me back here again.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: First off they hit you with a cleaning fee at check-in and then they want a $300 deposit that will take up to 30 days to be credited back to you. THIS IS NOT A HOTEL!!! These are privately owned condos that a "management" company oversees. Both nights we were here, our keys would not open the door and we had to stand outside for up to 30 mins waiting on maintenance to come and open up the door with there key. Drunk people knocking on our door all night, so not a family friendly place to stay. Avoid if at all possible. Not worth the cost!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: 3rd visit but left disappointed this time
column29: This was our 3rd visit to the Tuscana but sadly will probably be our last. We had an issue with our key cards being set up wrong at check in which left us locked out of our apartment and all the keys needed to be reset. Not really what you want after a long, hot day at a theme park.Also the grounds where not maintained as well as they had been in previous years. More litter and worse of all dog mess around the place than we had noticed in previous visits.When we visited they had an issue with a faulty fire alarm which for a day and a half went of randomly. Resulting in various trips from the local fire brigade and a lovely 2am wake up call for the guests in block 3. No apology was made by anyone at Tuscana for wakening up their guests with the faulty alarm, which had gone of 4 times during the day. At check out when I was asked how may stay was I mentioned the fire alarm situation and the gentleman made no apology and really obviously wasn't bothered. But then again it wasn't him woken at 2am.We always loved the Tuscana, hence this was our 3rd visit in 3 years but we are sadly booking different accomodation next year.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: I was with a group of golfers from MacDill AFB, Tampa, Florida that had rented 21 condos for at least 5 nights each. Due to an injury, I checked out on the forth night of my 5 night pre-paid reservation. The day after I left I was contacted by office staff asking when I was going to check out. I informed them that I had followed their procedures for check out when the office was closed and that I had left my card key in their drop box. They confirmed that the information was understood so I thought no more about it until a charge was placed against my debit card for $94.24 a full 5 days later. I have been in contact with the manager since I challenged the charge with my bank and have had no satisfaction for the last four days. Their excuse is that they have 2 computer systems and are too busy to resolve their mistake. I would never recommend this resort to a worst enemy as they are very rude and uncooperative.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Good thing it was a decent deal....because we won't be back!
column29: #1 when we arrived we were greated by Jenny who could use a lesson in customer service and satisfaction! Rude and not accommodating at all! #2 building 9 is horrible to stay in it is not in walking distance from the pool.....when we inquired about a different room with jenny we were told NO this is NOT a hotel! What ever that means! #3 $6.50 margaritas at the pool....this is not margaritaville! And they make you buy their food and drinks because you can't bring your own in the pool area or the alternative hop back in the car and drive back to your condo in a wet suit to eat! The rooms are nice and clean....the shades don't close so if you can't sleep in the light in the early am then you're not sleeping in on ur vaca! we did book this 8 months ago would have liked to be by the pool! they failed to mention A $300 deposit also which was never mentioned when we booked the condo!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Amazing holiday in a beautiful resort!
column29: Well I am sat round the pool on my last day and extremely sad to be going home! Was a little nervous before we came as there had been a few negative reviews, but I cannot fault resort and we are already looking at saving to come back. The resort is beautiful, clean and everything you could need for a home from home, apartment was spacious beds clean and very comfortable, it had every mod con you could need from a washer dryer to a huge oven, microwave and fridge a godsend with small children! The pool area and bar are lovely clean and our 2 and 6yr old loved it, there were plenty of loungers even when it's busy and the food and drinks are lovely and they have a great happy hour!You are very close to Disney 15mins and only 25mins from Universal, the local conviences are just a 5minute drive away and about a 20min walk and have a good publix supermarket and walgreens pharmacy, a macdonalds open 24/7 and a lovely restaurant called Chili's amongst a few other things. We flew to Sanford and that was about an hour away and an easy straight forward drive! All in all an amazing holiday which we have really enjoyed in a fabulous complex thank you Tuscana for a great place to stay and relax :-)

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We have just returned from a two week stay at the tuscana resort we had a lovely time there, the apartment was spotless and well equipped,however some things could do with updating ie..tv's and maybe an electric kettle.We stayed in block 5 witch was quite close to the i4 so we did experience quite a bit of noise.The staff were all friendly helpful and had a problem with being locked out my apartment one day and after reporting it to reception someone was there within 5 minutes to fix it.The pool area is lovely and has free wifi and a pool bar that serves food and drinks...my only problem with this was that you was not allowed to take your own food or drinks round the pool so are forced into buying from the bar never had this before at any other self catering apartments we have stayed in before...this meant we had to keep going back to apartment so we could give my granddaughter drinks...this was quite an inconvenience as it was quite a walk to the apartment and because of this we didn't use the pool quite as much as we would have liked to.The location is conveniently located just off i4 and within a couple of minutes of a publix supermarket, 7 eleven, macdonalds and a chillis and 15-20 mins of disney.I would definitely consider staying there on any future trips.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: A great place I would definitely recommend this resort Mandy w. Steve w. T k.
column29: We arrived at Tuscany on 13 of sept for two weeks this was my first time in Florida, we had a fantastic time there was eight of us in two apartments and both were spotless and trust me they were because im a bit of a tidy clean freak! They were quite big open plan with really good air conditioning and everything we needed the pool area was great bar staff were very friendly. Our toilet was blocked we went to reception to report it and the plumber was knocking on our door in five minutes and he sorted it straight away he was also a really nice guy. There was a supermarket, McDonald's, 7-11 and places to eat just round the corner if u didnt want to go far for something to eat or just have a bite and a drink round the pool - bar if you've had a long day, the food was lovely there.The parks were about 15-20 mins in the car and about an hour to bush gardens but well worth the ride.Id definitely stay here again at the same time of the year! I really don't get some of the bad comments on here and would definitely recommend this to anyone although we did have the top floor in block 7 so didn't experience any noise which was a bonus! Overall a great resort.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Very nice place lovely big suites, with great rooms Very quiet area with a good pool and bar. The only downside is if you get a ground floor apartment and have noisy people above I did complain but nothing ever changed. S&D TRANSPATION was great he was always there to take us anywhere we wanted. Disney is about 20 mins away. seaworld, discovery cove and universal about 30 mins

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: O Tuscana é um hotel bastante amplo, com vários blocos de apartamentos, pelo menos uns 10 blocos, porém muito organizado e limpo. o atendimento é ótimo, e os funcionários são bastante atenciosos. Como ele é estilo um flat, não fornece café da manhã, mas isto não atrapalha em nada, pois a cozinha é completamente equipada e tem tudo que a gente precisa.Mesmo sendo um hotel mais afastado, fica bem próximo ao Publix (mercado), ao Walgreens (tipo um farmácia que tem de tudo) e ao Mc' Donalds. Um ótimo hotel.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: Great location, easy access to I-4. Grocery store is right around the corner, along with a CVS. Disney World is only a 10 minute or less drive away. Tuscana Resort has a security gate, gated pool and lots of privacy. The condo is on the small side that's in need of a little updating. Especially with the tv's in the bedrooms and the furniture in the livingroom. Other than that, great full kitchen and two full bathrooms, one with a shower and the other one with a bathtub.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: We have stayed here 2x previously before this stay . Was a tad disapointed that our request of the same block and top floor wasnt met but hey ho we learned to live will the kids running up and down the apartment above us . Started at 7am for about an hour and then bout midnight for 20 mins.kids loved the pool and made some great friends there whilst playing and hubby enjoyed the bar.No problems with apartment very spacious and well equipped with everything we needed for our 3 wk stay. Chillis ,mc ds,7eleven and publixs less than 5 mins away. 10 mins from disney bout 20 mins from seaworld and universal and clearwater [highly recommended] an hour and half away. Would stay again but thinking of trying somewhere else for a change

column27: Great location but management company not interested in you.
column29: Great location pool and condos. We stayed here 4 years ago and standards of cleanliness have dropped. Bed sheets not clean on arrival pool edge tiling dirty like bath scum!! I informed the management company and the response between the 2 ladies in reception was in Spanish to each other and then to me to say that they are not a hotel!!! Great help!! And this is the only reason I think I would not stay here again just shear arrogance. This apart bar staff friendly food good plenty of choice. If you want a quiet balcony get one away from the I4 freeway

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: Ficamos 15 dias, em 6 pessoas. Os apartamentos são muito espaçosos e bem completos. Porém o atendimento deixou MUITO a desejar. O sistema do cartão/chave do nosso quarto, do nosso primo que se hospedou tambem no tuscana e de outros hospedes apresentava problema frequentemente. Ficamos presos para fora do quarto no mínimo 4 vezes, sempre a noite, cansados, e passando frio e a manutenção levava no mínimo 30min para resolver o problema. Quando iamos na recepção reclamar era um descaso total. Não recomendo.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: Stayed for two nights, first night the key to the room didn't work.The shower is a nightmare, there is almost no water to take a bath, no shampoo or shower gel.the balcony is dirty with cigarettes buts, the towels are old. If you call the front desk the call goes to the maintenance department. The bar at the pool is another thing to be away from it, the drinks are terrible. Please stay away from this terrible" resort"

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We decided to stay at this resort again after we had previously stayed here before. This resort has all of the amenities you could ask for. They have a game room, a screening room, a restaurant, and much more to offer. The resort also had a jacuzzi. The only disappointing part was that late during our trip, the jacuzzi wasn't giving off hot water but more of a coolish warm type of water. The week during our stay, they had karaoke night for I believe the whole week we had stayed there. All public areas of the resort were well maintained. It was truly evident that the staff work hard to maintain the resort. The resort is near all of the major parks such as Disney and a few miles away from a Wal-Mart and the Orlando Premium Outlets store. The resort was located in the beautiful ChampinsGate. It was a very picturesque community with palm trees perfectly placed amongst water fountains and a ChampionsGate sign. It was truly a beautiful scene.Overall, Tuscana Resort has excellent facilities, units, and staff. We truly enjoyed our stay and we will most definitely visit again.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: we go back here in 14 days I carnt wait to see them all again they have now become friends the resort is the best in davenport florida the condors are massive and have everything u need plz give this place a look at if u are going to Disney its only a 10 mins drive away

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: A very pretty and welcoming place. Restaurant food is excelent, and staff are very friendly and welcoming. The condos are large with three large bedrooms, all withown tv, big living room/kitchen, with washer and dryer. The pool area is a decent size and also has a toddler paddle pool. A great place to relax and make friends, yet still be able to keep to yourself.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: Nos hospedamos en ese maravilloso complejo, todo divino, el departamento completísimo, te ahorras muchísimo en comida, que por cierto allí es muy cara, por suerte en el dpto. podíamos cocinar, lavar y secar la ropa . El complejo es espectacular, veníamos cansados cada día luego de recorrer los parques de Disney y nos íbamos a la pileta del Tuscana hasta que cerraba. Todo bello, lo extrañooooo!!!!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Let me start by saying we opened the cupboard to find a hugeeee bug on our plates!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Make sure you look out for that!Oh, we found chicken bones and left over chicken under the sink next to the garbage can! I wonder about cleanliness.People next door made a ton of noise for 2 weeks, banging on walls, yelling, running around, and no one did anything about it. I called the front desk 4 times and went to see them twice. I barely slept at all in these 2 weeks. Noise was continuous through all hours of the night. They kept saying "we can't do anything". They didn't even try to make it better! I would have thought they would have comped us Internet or something to make up for the inconvenience! Customer service = 0.The room itself was noisy. We heard the water through the walls, doors slamming, the fridge and the ac vent.It's further than stated on their site. It's at least 20 minutes away from everything, outlets, malls, universal and disney parks. So be prepared to drive. Closest thing is Hollywood studios 13 min away. The upside, publix, Chili's, subway, Mc Donald's, Pizza Hut, dunkin donuts, a 7 eleven and the I-4 were super close.The "business center" is one computer in their "main lobby" you have 15 minutes to use it (max) and you can't even sit. And it's only open when the people are working so if you have an early flight and would like to "check-in to your flight" early don't even think about doing it there. It was super super slow, took forever! Printer was "down". And who doesn't offer free wi-fi these days! Calls are even "barred" from the phone.Pool is smaller than we thought. I wonder if the elevator is up to code. The paper in the elevator stated it was good until august 1st.... We left a couple of days ago and it wasn't changed. The beds are tiny! And the sofa bed wow we closed that thing faster than we opened it! Can honestly say, I will never be coming back here. We read the reviews and said "well there are good ones! The bad ones aren't so bad." We should have listened!!! We've stayed at better for cheaper and closer, do your research.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Stayed at the Tuscana in 2011 easter time and had an amazing stay. 3 bedroomed condo was huge with TV in each bedroom ( happy kids ) as well as lounge area. Didn't really lack for anything in condo, a lovely cool place to return too after days at the park. We did Universal, about 25 mins away, no problem at all. Yes I4 does get busy at peak times, but keeps moving. Close by to a number of stores/eateries. This will be the first time we have returned to ANY holiday complex and cannot wait. A late review, but now booked to go back, Roll on easter 2014.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Stayed here last year for 2 yearsIdeally located as long as you have a car.Just a few minutes from Disney world and about 20 mins from international drive and universalOur apartment was massive, with 3 huge bedrooms, all with there own tv, big living roomAnd kitchen, washer and dryer.Resort was fantastically clean with a decent sized poolWe were highly impressed and would definitely go back if given the chance

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Just got back from 14 night stay on 14th August 2013, we were on the ground floor of block 8, next to block 9 supposedly 1 mile walk from the pool if you believe a previous review( what utter nonsense) no more than 200yds if that, maybe 300 for block 9. The condo was totally clean when we arrived, had 3 brand new Samsung Smart TVs in each room and double beds in both rooms ( perhaps the only downside was the comfy ness of the mattress on the sofa bed, and a lack of single beds for the kids so we all had to double up) but we were barely disturbed by any noise whatsoever. The staff were friendly and helpful, the pool was exceptionally good, clean and safe( no deeper than 4ft 9 I think) which meant our 6 year old daughter had an absolute fantastic time in the pool with her 3 older brothers. As for Disney being too far away, that's nonsense too, unless your going to walk there of course, Disney is 4 junctions up on the I4 (jct 62), Tuscana is at jct 58. Takes just 20 mins or sodriving. Amenities near by are good, 7-11, Publix supermarket, Chinese takeaway, French restaurant, McDonald's , Chillis Restaurant, Subway, hairdresser/barber, off licence/liquor store to name just a few , just half a mile walk or 2 mins in car from gates of the condo complex... All in all it's a fantastic place to stay and I'd fully recommend it to my friends and family... Oh and one highlight of our stay, swimming in the pool at 10pm at night, the pool water as warm as the air outside after being heated by the sun all day and in the distance watching thunder and lighting take place in the distance... Very surreal lol. Can't say enough about the place just absolutely fantastic, and were from the UK so this is a totally unbiased independent review by me.Mr David Osborne and Family (6 in total stayed )

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: The resort was beautiful! We stayed in a 3 bedroom condo that was very spacious. The pool was very nice. The resort is about 15 minutes from Universal Studios and Disney World, so it was a great location. Would definitely recommend!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column27: Excellent condo but far from the pool
column29: My son and I checked into a two bedroom condo that we had reserved. It was in one of the last buildings which was right near the highway. We could see the building from the highway too! However, once inside the noise from the highway was not noticeable. It was far away from the pool.However, the inside of the condo was in excellent, clean condition. The TV's were the older, bulky style but had enough channels for us. Everything else seemed up dated. There is a Publix, McDonalds, Subway, hair cutting place, etc. very close! However, Universal Studios and the Disney parks are not so close and when there is traffic it does take a long time to get to and from them.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Just returned from one week vacation at the Tuscana Resort. All in all we had a great time and would recommend this resort. Traveling with our teenage age daughter and her friend. 2 bedroom condo: Very clean, spacious rooms with large walk-in closets, separate washrooms, screened patio, good size kitchen (need to bring your own paper towel, garbage bags, etc., as others have recommended). Occasionally heard family above us but nothing to complain about. Blinds do not block out full sun so not completely dark in room. Very well kept landscaping and pool area. Staff are friendly and pleasant. Will return!

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Very disappointed to say the least. Ended up leaving early. Could not tolerate the noise level above our condo. Very poor bed & bedding. Old TV's with not much choice to watch. Not close enough to the Disney attractions. The only close restaurant was Chile's and we had to wait 2 hrs. to get in. One plus was having the washer & dryer, that was nice. After complaining & leaving early they did refund one nights stay, even though we left 2 nights early. Just not what we expected the pictures are very deceiving. Also I asked to be close to the pool area as I just finished chemo in May, so walking long distances is tiring. We ended up in building 9, at least a mile walk to the pool :( Needless to say I never even saw the pool area.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Tuscana resorts is very pretty. But my experience changed from good to bad when I had to wait 45 minutes for them to clean my room. After driving 7 hours, i expect to check in on time. I finally got over that,but when I got ready to get in the bed that night, I realized the maid must have been in a rush because piss and hair was on the toilet seat. I was prepared with my clorox wipes..But what made me mad was I went to put my 4 year old to sleep that night and turned back the sheets to find those same curly hairs were in my sheets..The sheets had not been washed.. I advised the front desk and they told me house keeping was gone for the day..I asked them for sheets and they said they didn't gave any..Pretty much end of conversation

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Great holiday if traveling to parks you will need a car to get around as most places are about 30 mins away. shops at the bottom off the road (5mins)and places to eat !!! also great golf course at the omni (need to give this a go ) had a great time.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: We were slightly skeptical about tuscana due to mixed reviews on here but we nothing too worry about. We arrived after a long day to a clean apartment on the top floor and the only point to note on entry was one of the bedroom blinds was broken. We reported this the next day and it was replaced quickly. The resort is very close to the major parks and has a Chilis restaurant very close by if you need it plus a publix supermarket and Walgreens and pizza restaurant. We tried the food a tuscana after a few days and wished we'd found it before! It is not international haute cuisine, but is great food and great prices. The hot wings are great and my only regret was not being able to eat the full menu! We did not experience any of the criticisms voiced on here...apartment very clean and tidy, not noisy and we had everything we needed. I would like to say a special thank you to the lovely bar staff of Candy, Lauren and Jenny. Some nights it was very busy and they were so nice to us from day 1...fab ladies, all 3 and a credit to the Tuscana. We had said that this (2nd) trip to Orlando would be our last but we really want to visit again and plan to return in 2015 (would have been sooner but next years holiday is booked). This accommodation is not for everyone...you could get a lot cheaper hotel on International Drive but I'm a firm believer in you get what you pay for and this was real value for money. My only advice to Tuscana maybe to add a complimentary starter pack for guests...even if it just tea and coffee for first night.....this really would add the nicest touch. Thanks Tuscana to you and your staff especially those in he Tavern

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Just returned from a 2 weeks holiday staying in a 3 bedroom top floor apartment room 5404 at tuscana resort. The apartment had a brand new feel to it, with it having flat screen televisions and what seemed like a brand new carpet throughout. The apartment was overlooking the golf course and had a balcony which was fully screened to keep out any midges etc. The apartment was spacious and it was close to Disney so we could come back and relax freely. The resort had a good size pool with plenty of loungers and also cabanas to keep you in the shade. Check in was easy and all staff were helpful and polite at all times. The on site restaurant was well priced with a good selection of food. Overall a great place to stay in a great location, we will definetly be back and will recommend to friends. Thank you for a great stay

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners
column14: Kitchenette, Suites, Non-Smoking Rooms, Family Rooms
column16: CN¥612 - CN¥2,400 (Based on Average Rates for a Standard Room)
column29: Estive hospedado neste resort em junho de 2012 e estarei novamente em setembro deste ano. Considero o melhor para se hospedar em Orlando. Fica proximo a tudo e convenhamos Orlando de carro é um prazer e vc precisa de carro la.Apartamentos mobiliados, completíssimos, piscina maravilhosa, staffs sensasionais, não vejo nem 1 ponto negativo pois não se trata de hotel e sim de apartamentos mobiliados.Se vc quer ter sua casa em orlando e as vezes ainda melhor que nossa propria casa, este é o lugar.procure Videos no youtube... a Top Tour tem 2 videos que mostram um pouco deste lugar sensacional e barato.

column6: #2 of 7 Specialty Lodging in Four Corners

column29: Stayed here for 2 weeks and thoroughly enjoyed the stay. We stayed on the ground floor in a 3 bed apt in block 5. Didn't have any major noise issues. Certainly none from the I4 road as a few have mentioned. Could here the AC units starting up and the people upstairs every now and then, but nothing major. The apartment was well equipped and furnished to a good standard. All good equipment in the kitchen area and the washer/dryer was a Godsend. The whole apartment was fully air conditioned which worked great, cos you need it. The pool area was ideal for relaxing at and the food and drink at the bar was both reasonably priced and good quality. Perhaps the only slight negative on our part was, at night the bar area is more suited to adults not younger kids. We didn't have any problems with the apartment, however there did appear to be a well manned team buzzing around on their golf carts that probably would have been able to sort any issues. Check in was a breeze, much easier than many hotels I've stayed at. Yes, they do take a deposit on your credit card but totally understand why. After all it is someone else's house you're living in. If it was your house you'd like the piece of mind that any damage, accidental or otherwise would be taken care of. All in all an excellent base for our Florida holiday. Very close to the Disney attractions and 192 Kissimmee 10-15 min drive. A bit longer to the Universal attractions and International Drive areas, especially if the traffic was playing up. But great amenities on site if you just want to chill for the day. There is a Publix supermarket nearby and a few restaurants as well at the entrance road upto the resort, which are really handy.

Extemely loud on the patio.Positives1. Clean and comfortable. Beds, bedding, floors, patios, bathrooms, closets and kitchen were all very clean and well maintained. Nothing made me feel gross about the place at all.(I always pack sheets and throw over furniture anyway) :)2. Pool area was clean. Pool was clean. Hot tub and cabanas, plenty of lounging chairs, tons of shade.3. Felt safe4. Grounds of property were clean and well maintained5. Location is great with a Publix, Chilis, 7-11, walgreens, pizza place and more within a half mile.

column29: 2 weeks ago my wife and I decided we were going to spend the weekend at Disney World and use the last few days up on or Florida resident passes since they expire on June 7th 2013. Originally we were just going to drive back and forth. After all, it is only an hour drive from our house. Then it hit me! Let’s stay at a resort and make it a mini vacation to kick off the summer. On May 28th she spoke to the Tuscana Resort and made our reservations to check into a two bedroom suite. We were all set to check in on May 31st and to check out on June 2nd. Friday arrived and we were all set. Everything was packed and ready for a great weekend! We had some issues at home though that we had to address before we could get on the road. She called the hotel to notify them that we're not sure we would be there in time to check in by 10pm and to please put the key in the box if were had not arrived by 10pm. She was told where the box was located and given the key code to retrieve our key and instructions. We arrived at the hotel at 10:30 pm, parked under the overhang and went to the lock box to retrieve our key. Upon opening the box it was completely empty! However, she noticed some people standing inside at the desk. When we went to open the door however, it was locked. When she knocked another guest let me in. We saw her name on the welcome sign and thought it was pretty neat! One of the guests at the desk seemed to be having issues with their deposit so we waited in line. After about five minutes of waiting a gentleman asked if he could help us. She told him we are here to check in and that the key was not in the box. He took our name and went to get another man from the back because his stack of keys were all mixed up and just had room numbers on them. After the second man came out he gave me my room number and my key as well as an Insider’s Guide to Walt Disney which had the resort map and gate code on the back. He showed her on the map where our room was located and where we should park. She asked if he needed anything else and was told no. So we left the front desk with the map and key and was ready to get settled into our suite.When we arrived to the unit we found it clean and well kept. We had a full kitchen with full size appliances including a stove/oven, Dining room, Living room, screened patio. Two bedrooms with walk in closets, as well as two bathrooms. It was great! I walked around to all the doors and windows to make sure they were locked, just as I does any place we stay. As I made the rounds checking it all out he realized all the air vents were closed, so I took a chair around to each of them so I could reach and open them. The next thing we noticed was the false drapes in the bedrooms. On either side of both windows were a single drapery panel hung to look like open drapes, however they were not on functional rods and could not close to cover the window. The only things covering each bedroom window were thin mini blinds. Since we were facing a parking lot, the rooms were fully illuminated even with the blinds closed. My wife have a very hard time sleeping with any light so this was a definite drawback for her! The two bedrooms and the living room all three had a 19-22 inch tube TV. I was not very impressed by the lack of updating to the TV’s. The size and age of the TV’s did not bother her as much as not having local news channels available to watch on them. The bath tub in the unit was so slow to drain. She finally had to unscrew the drain plug completely just to try to get the water out faster. 8 inches of water in the tub only drained to 4 inches of water in 2 hours! After removing the drain plug completely the water drained quickly. It had one of those fancy push button drain plugs, step once to close and again to open… all it did was block the water, even in the open position. Finally after the shower it was time to sleep. Both rooms had a queen size bed. The beds were firmer than I like, but were ok for a couple nights.Saturday morning we woke up and made pancakes in our room for breakfast then headed off to Typhoon Lagoon to spend the morning. After Typhoon Lagoon we went back to our neighborhood for our annual block party. When the party was over we took our girls (ages 8 and 5) and headed back to the resort. When we arrived back our room key would not work, so to the front office we went. Since it was after 10pm the office was closed. On the door is a sign with a phone number to call as well as a phone to use to call the afterhours staff. She called using her cell phone so she could wait in the car. After 20 minutes of listening to “elevator music” she decided to walk into the bar to see if there was someone there who could help us. After speaking to the nice man who runs the resort bar she was informed that she was actually on hold with an answering service and they would have to try to reach whoever was on call for the night and that he had no access to anything to do with the resort and it could take hours to get into our room. Finally after 30 minutes of being on hold a person answers the phone and takes my info. She told her the on call person will call her back shortly. She walked back out to the car where I and sleeping kids were waiting. I am completely fed up by this point. I decided that I am going to go inside to the bar to use the bathroom and we will try our key one last time before going home. I've been wearing contacts all day and they were bothering my eyes, thankfully we had my glasses with us, but not the lens case/solution. it was in our suite. I took my contacts out and threw them away wasting a brand new pair of month long contacts. When we went back to the room to try for one last time, I noticed a man with a clipboard near our room looking around. This was apparently the on call person there to let us in. The on call person however NEVER tried to call us. We finally made it into the room at 11:30pm got the kids settled into bed and then showered. By the time we made it to bed it was almost 2 am and there was no way we were going to be able to wake up in the morning to go to Disney World with the kids.Sunday morning we woke up around 9am she went straight to the office to find out about our key and to check out while I made us breakfast in the room. The lady in the office said that the key was only programmed to work for one night and we were supposed to come back on Saturday morning to check in… My wife thought that’s what she did Friday night!? Needless to say, she were upset. She checked out with the credit card that the resort had on file and went back to our room. There was no way my wife and I were going to last all day at Disney so we had to disappoint our girls and tell them we couldn’t go. Since our tickets expire the 7th this was our last weekend to be able to use them up. The girls watched a little TV in the room while I packed up everything and we left the resort at 11am. On the way home we stopped by the Florida Mall and let the girls get some m & m’s from the m & m store. While this mini vacation turned into a major disappointment for our family, I’m hoping the girls will only remember the fun stop at the mall and not the fact that they didn’t get to go to Disney.To make matters worse, Disney raise the ticket prices the very next day. Since my wife and I had tickets to use for this trip were would have all had tickets. Our tickets however expire on the 7th of June, which means if we try to come back later in the summer we will have to spend an additional $201.40 on tickets for me and her to use. While we thought the resort was nice and had a great location, we would never feel comfortable staying there again unless there was a staffed front desk 24/7. The last thing you want is to be locked out of your room with no place to go in the middle of the night with two small children, even if home is only an hour away.

column29: The Tuscana Resort is a great option if you do not mind a 15-20 minute drive to the Disney properties, and you would like a nice quiet place to relax. The Tuscana Resort is conveniently located right off I-4 and is down a quiet road with no other properties on it, so quiet in fact that I almost turned around to make sure I was heading the right way. This resort was great for a weekend, but I would be a bit disappointed if I were staying there on vacation. The pool area is clean and nice. However, there is only 1 pool, and it is only located close to the lobby. You would really have to do some walking if you were in building 9. I found it funny that they refer to the area that building 9 is located in to be the "conservation area" especially because the 1st thing you see is a massive back-flow prevention system and a series of 2 dumpsters.The rooms are clean with granite counter tops, showers were poorly constructed, and not sealed correctly leaving them very dirty looking (please refer to the many pictures that others have posted and you will see what I am talking about). Try to be on the top floor if available, or hope that you are below a family that puts their kids to bed (or themselves) at a decent hour. I don't care how insulated a building is, nothing stops the sound of jumping. We had a 2nd floor unit, and you could hear a lot of noise above us.The staff was OK, the check-in process is a little odd as there is no front desk area. There were 3 people sitting at desks and no one really showing people where to go. I would imagine that this would be frustrating if you were checking in at busy time.I am not sure that I would go back to this resort as there are many others that are closer and offer more amenities, but it worked for a short trip. I would seek out other options if you are looking for a relaxing vacation.

column29: I have just returned from a holiday at tuscana. I have been visiting florida now for over ten years and have stayed at many resorts. I can quite easily say tuscana resort is by far one of the nicest places. The rooms are very clean and ideal for your needs which also give you that home from home feeling.It proves to give you great value for money, and the location is perfect which ever holiday you are planning. It's an easy drive to the parks. A stones throw from many golf courses and numerous restaurants and shops with in a short drive. The staff are very polite and will always make you feel welcome.The pool area is good again very clean. And the bar/restaurant Are an added bonus if you are not in the mood to travel out.I will for sure return to tuscana and can't thank the team there enough for ensuring my stay was an amazing one.

column29: Just back from a 7 night stay in tuscana and had no issues, condo was excellent, fully equipped with everything you could need, the staff were all v friendly and helpful, the pool bar was excellent, we ate there lots of times and the bar staff were fantastic, would have absolutely no problem in recommending this place for anyone travelling to Orlando, will definitely be back!!
